translated: To show that, he says:

original: 'gro ba med na 'gro ba po //
analyzed: 'gro ba med na 'gro ba po //
translated: If there is no going, there is no goer.

original: nam yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: It is never tenable.

original: 'gro ba ji ltar med pa de ltar ni dang po kho nar /
analyzed: 'gro ba ji ltar med pa de ltar ni dang po kho nar /
translated: As for how going does not exist, this has already been explained in theüîΩfirst chapter, beginning with:

original: re zhig song la 'gro med de //
analyzed: re zhig song la 'gro med de //
translated: First, there is no going where one has gone.

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / 'gro ba skye ba dgag pa der bstan zin to //
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang / 'gro ba skye ba dgag pa der bstan zin to //
translated: And in the refutation of the arising of going.

original: yang na / re zhig 'gro po mi 'gro ste //
analyzed: yang na / re zhig 'gro po mi 'gro ste //
translated: Moreover, first, the goer does not go

original: zhes bya ba ni dam bcas pa nye bar bzhag pa yin la /
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni dam bcas pa nye bar bzhag pa yin la /
translated: is the presentation of the thesis.

original: re zhig 'gro po @68a * //
analyzed: re zhig 'gro po @68a * //
translated: First, it is said,üîΩHow could it be tenable to say

original: 'gro'o zhes // ji ltar 'thad pa nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: 'gro'o zhes // ji ltar 'thad pa nyid du 'gyur //
translated: ‚ÄúThe goer goes‚Äù?

original: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de ston par byed pa yin te /
analyzed: zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni de ston par byed pa yin te /
translated: And so on presents the explanation of that.

original: ji skad bshad pa bzhin du rnam par bshad par bya'o //
analyzed: ji skad bshad pa bzhin du rnam par bshad par bya'o //
translated: It should be explained according to what has been explained.

original: de'i phyir de ltar don dam par 'gro ba med pa bzhin du 'gro ba po yang dag pa ma yin yang sgro btags nas 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar don dam par 'gro ba med pa bzhin du 'gro ba po yang dag pa ma yin yang sgro btags nas 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhe na /
translated: Thus, just as ultimately going does not exist, in the same way, although the goer is not real, having superimposed the goer, it is said, ‚ÄúThe goer goes.‚Äù

original: gang gi phyogs la 'gro ba po //üîΩ'gro ba de la 'gro med pa'i //
analyzed: gang gi phyogs la 'gro ba po // 'gro ba de la 'gro med pa'i //
translated: In the system of those for whomüîΩThe goer goes,üîΩIt follows that the goer

original: 'gro po yin par thal 'gyur te //
analyzed: 'gro po yin par thal 'gyur te //
translated: Would be without going.

original: 'gro po 'gro bar 'dod phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro po 'gro bar 'dod phyir ro //
translated: Because one who goes is asserted to be a goer.

original: smra ba gang gi phyogs la 'gro ba po 'gro bar 'dod pa de la 'gro ba med pa'i 'gro ba po yin par thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: smra ba gang gi phyogs la 'gro ba po 'gro bar 'dod pa de la 'gro ba med pa'i 'gro ba po yin par thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: In whatever philosophical system one who goes is asserted to be a goer, it follows that one who goes would be a goer without going.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: 'di ltar 'gro ba po 'gro bar 'dod pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: 'di ltar 'gro ba po 'gro bar 'dod pa'i phyir te /
translated: Because one who goes is asserted to be a goer.

original: 'di ltar 'gro ba med na 'gro ba po la 'gro ba de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: 'di ltar 'gro ba med na 'gro ba po la 'gro ba de dang ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Thus, if going does not exist, one who goes would possess going.

original: yang na 'gro ba gcig pu zhig yod pa de dag ni 'gro'o zhes bya ba de la yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na 'gro ba gcig pu zhig yod pa de dag ni 'gro'o zhes bya ba de la yongs su rdzogs par byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, if only one going exists, it is completed in those who go.

original: ci ste skyon de yongs su spang bar 'dod pas 'gro ba po don dam pa pa'i 'gro ba dang ldan par 'dod na de lta na yang /
analyzed: ci ste skyon de yongs su spang bar 'dod pas 'gro ba po don dam pa pa'i 'gro ba dang ldan par 'dod na de lta na yang /
translated: But if you assert that one who goes possesses ultimate going in order to completely abandon that error, then in that case also:

original: gal te 'gro po 'gro gyur na //
analyzed: gal te 'gro po 'gro gyur na //
translated: If one who goes goes,

original: 'gro ba gnyis su thal 'gyur te //
analyzed: 'gro ba gnyis su thal 'gyur te //
translated: it follows that there are two goings:

original: gang gis 'gro por mngon pa dang // 'gro por gyur nas gang 'gro ba'o //
analyzed: gang gis 'gro por mngon pa dang // 'gro por gyur nas gang 'gro ba'o //
translated: that by which one is called a goer and the going of one who is a goer.

original: gal te 'gro ba po gang 'gro ba dang ldan par gyur na 'gro ba gnyis su thal bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: gal te 'gro ba po gang 'gro ba dang ldan par gyur na 'gro ba gnyis su thal bar 'gyur te /
translated: If the goer were to possess going, then the error of two goings would ensue.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba po zhes bya bar mngon pa dang 'gro ba por gyur nas 'gro ba'i 'gro ba gang yin pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba po zhes bya bar mngon pa dang 'gro ba por gyur nas 'gro ba'i 'gro ba gang yin pa'o //
translated: The going by means of which one is called a goer, and the going that is possessed by the goer.

original: de lta na /üîΩ'gro ba gnyis su thal 'gyur na //üîΩ'gro ba po yang gnyis su 'gyur //
analyzed: de lta na / 'gro ba gnyis su thal 'gyur na // 'gro ba po yang gnyis su 'gyur //
translated: In that case,üîΩthe consequence would be that there would be two goings.

original: gang phyir 'gro po med par ni //
analyzed: gang phyir 'gro po med par ni //
translated: And the goer would also be twofold.üîΩThis error would ensue,

original: 'gro ba 'thad par mi 'gyur phyir //üîΩzhes bya ba'i skyon 'di yang yod de /
analyzed: 'gro ba 'thad par mi 'gyur phyir // zhes bya ba'i skyon 'di yang yod de /
translated: because going is not tenable without a goer.

original: bya ba ni gzhi la rag las pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: bya ba ni gzhi la rag las pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that the action depends on the basis.

original: 'gro ba med pa'i 'gro ba po nyid dang / 'gro ba gnyis dang / 'gro ba po gnyis su 'gyur ba de yang mi 'dod de /
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa'i 'gro ba po nyid dang / 'gro ba gnyis dang / 'gro ba po gnyis su 'gyur ba de yang mi 'dod de /
translated: But that the goer would be without going, that there would be two goings, and that there would be two goers is unacceptable.

original: ji ltar 'dod ce na /
analyzed: ji ltar 'dod ce na /
translated: How is it unacceptable?

original: 'gro ba po la 'gro ba yod pa dang / 'gro ba yang gcig kho na dang 'gro ba po yang gcig kho nar 'dod do //
analyzed: 'gro ba po la 'gro ba yod pa dang / 'gro ba yang gcig kho na dang 'gro ba po yang gcig kho nar 'dod do //
translated: It is unacceptable that the goer would possess going, that there would be only one going, and that there would be only one goer.

original: de yang kun rdzob tu 'grub kyang don dam par mi 'grub pas dpe med pa'i phyir pha rol pos smras pa'i sgrub pa mi 'grub bo //
analyzed: de yang kun rdzob tu 'grub kyang don dam par mi 'grub pas dpe med pa'i phyir pha rol pos smras pa'i sgrub pa mi 'grub bo //
translated: Moreover, since it is established conventionally but not ultimately, there is no example, and therefore the proof that the opponent states is not established.

original: phyir rgol ba dag 'gro ba ni yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: phyir rgol ba dag 'gro ba ni yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: Opponents: Sentient beings definitely exist,

original: de'i rtsom pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de'i rtsom pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because their activity exists.

original: 'di na gang med pa de la ni rtsom pa med de /
analyzed: 'di na gang med pa de la ni rtsom pa med de /
translated: Here, that which does not exist has no activity,

original: dper na nam mkha'i me tog gi phreng ba la rtsom pa med pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na nam mkha'i me tog gi phreng ba la rtsom pa med pa bzhin no //
translated: just as, for example, a garland of sky flowers has no activity.

original: sdod @68b par gyur pa la ni rab tu g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'gro ba rtsom pa yod pas /
analyzed: sdod @68b par gyur pa la ni rab tu g-yo ba'i mtshan nyid kyi 'gro ba rtsom pa yod pas /
translated: But for one who abides, the activity of going, which has the characteristic of movement, exists.

original: de'i phyir 'gro ba yod pa kho na'o zhe na /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'gro ba yod pa kho na'o zhe na /
translated: Therefore going definitely exists.

original: 'dir bya gag tshon sna tshogs dang ldan pa nyid kha dog gzhan du bsgyur te /
analyzed: 'dir bya gag tshon sna tshogs dang ldan pa nyid kha dog gzhan du bsgyur te /
translated: Here, just as a peacock‚Äôs tail feather, which possesses various colors, is transformed into another color,

original: nye bar 'jog pa bzhin du /
analyzed: nye bar 'jog pa bzhin du /
translated: so too,

original: sngar lan btab zin pa nyid tshig gzhan gyis nye bar bzhag pas 'di lta ste /
analyzed: sngar lan btab zin pa nyid tshig gzhan gyis nye bar bzhag pas 'di lta ste /
translated: since a response has already been given earlier, it is presented here with different words.

original: slob dpon gyis 'dir 'gro ba'i rtsom pa de nyid ci song ba'am /
analyzed: slob dpon gyis 'dir 'gro ba'i rtsom pa de nyid ci song ba'am /
translated: Here the master says, ‚ÄúThe activity of going is either in that gone over or in that not yet gone over.

original: ma song ba'am /
analyzed: ma song ba'am /
translated: Or, is it on that being gone over?

original: 'on te bgom pa la yod ces khyod la brgal zhing brtags na snga ma bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mi 'thad par bstan par bzhed pas bshad pa /
analyzed: 'on te bgom pa la yod ces khyod la brgal zhing brtags na snga ma bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mi 'thad par bstan par bzhed pas bshad pa /
translated: When you are questioned and examined in this way, it is explained that all of your positions are untenable, just as they were previously.

original: song la 'gro ba'i rtsom med de //
analyzed: song la 'gro ba'i rtsom med de //
translated: There is no beginning of going where one has gone,

original: de la 'gro ba'i bya ba 'das zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'gro ba'i bya ba 'das zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the action of going has already ceased there.

original: ma song ba la'ang 'gro rtsom med //
analyzed: ma song ba la'ang 'gro rtsom med //
translated: Nor is there a beginning of going where one has not yet gone,

original: ma song ba 'gro bas stong pa la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: ma song ba 'gro bas stong pa la 'gro ba med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because where one has not yet gone is empty of going.

original: bgom la rtsom pa yod ma yin //
analyzed: bgom la rtsom pa yod ma yin //
translated: Nor is there a beginning of going where one is going,

original: song ba dang ma song ba ma gtogs par bgom pa rtag tu med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: song ba dang ma song ba ma gtogs par bgom pa rtag tu med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because apart from where one has gone and where one has not yet gone, there is never any place where one is going.

original: gang du 'gro ba rtsom par byed //
analyzed: gang du 'gro ba rtsom par byed //
translated: Where does the beginning of going occur?üîΩNow state what you accept, by means of which the reason is established and the meaning of the thesis is accomplished.

original: 'o na gang gis ji skad smras pa'i gtan tshigs 'grub pas 'dod pa'i don 'grub par 'gyur ba de da smros shig / des na 'dis song ba dang / ma song ba dang / bgom pa dag la rtsom pa med par bstan to zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
analyzed: 'o na gang gis ji skad smras pa'i gtan tshigs 'grub pas 'dod pa'i don 'grub par 'gyur ba de da smros shig / des na 'dis song ba dang / ma song ba dang / bgom pa dag la rtsom pa med par bstan to zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //
translated: Thus, the meaning of the words is that this shows that there is no beginning of going where one has gone, where one has not yet gone, and where one is going.

original: de ltar na 'dir sbyor ba'i tshig dag tu 'gyur ba ni song ba la 'gro ba'i rtsom pa med de /
analyzed: de ltar na 'dir sbyor ba'i tshig dag tu 'gyur ba ni song ba la 'gro ba'i rtsom pa med de /
translated: The beginning of going does not exist where one has gone,

original: lam yin pa'i phyir dper na ma song ba'i lam bzhin no //
analyzed: lam yin pa'i phyir dper na ma song ba'i lam bzhin no //
translated: because it is a path, like a path where one has not yet gone.

original: yang na ma song ba la 'gro ba'i rtsom pa med de /
analyzed: yang na ma song ba la 'gro ba'i rtsom pa med de /
translated: Or, the beginning of going does not exist where one has not yet gone,

original: ma song ba'i phyir dper na 'gro bar 'dod pa las gzhan pa'i ma song ba bzhin no //
analyzed: ma song ba'i phyir dper na 'gro bar 'dod pa las gzhan pa'i ma song ba bzhin no //
translated: because it is where one has not yet gone, like where one has gone.

original: de bzhin du bgom pa la yang 'gro ba'i rtsom pa mi 'thad de /üîΩlam yin pa'i phyir dper na /
analyzed: de bzhin du bgom pa la yang 'gro ba'i rtsom pa mi 'thad de / lam yin pa'i phyir dper na /
translated: In the same way, the beginning of going is untenable where one is going,

original: de las gzhan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa bzhin no //
translated: because it is a path, like where one has gone and where one has not yet gone.

original: de'i phyir de ltar rtsom pa med pas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar rtsom pa med pas /
translated: Therefore, since the beginning of going does not exist in any of these ways,

original: rtsom pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dang / thun mong ma yin pa nyid do //
analyzed: rtsom pa'i gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dang / thun mong ma yin pa nyid do //
translated: the reason ‚Äúbecause of beginning‚Äù is not established and is not unique.

original: rgyas par ni snga ma bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyas par ni snga ma bzhin no //
translated: The rest is as was previously explained.

original: 'dir smras pa /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa /
translated: Here, someone might say:

original: 'o na 'gro ba rnam pa gzhan gyis yod par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'o na 'gro ba rnam pa gzhan gyis yod par shes par bya ste /
translated: But going is known to exist in another way.

original: rang gi gnas skabs las gzhan du 'gyur ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po la brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa'i rgyu yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi gnas skabs las gzhan du 'gyur ba dang ldan pa'i dngos po la brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa'i rgyu yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because there is a cause for the application of the term ‚Äúgoing‚Äù to an entity that possesses the state of being other than its prior state.

original: 'di na gang med pa de la ni rang gi gnas skabs las gzhan du gyur pa dang ldan pa'i dngos po la brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa'i rgyu med de /
analyzed: 'di na gang med pa de la ni rang gi gnas skabs las gzhan du gyur pa dang ldan pa'i dngos po la brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa'i rgyu med de /
translated: Here, for that which does not exist, there is no cause for the application of the term ‚Äúgoing‚Äù to an entity that possesses the state of being other than its prior state.

original: dper na / dmus long mig gi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba la dmus long gis mthong ngo //
analyzed: dper na / dmus long mig gi rnam par shes pa dang bral ba la dmus long gis mthong ngo //
translated: For example, there is no cause for the application of the term ‚Äúgoing‚Äù to a blind person who is devoid of the eye consciousness,

original: dmus long lta'o //
analyzed: dmus long lta'o //
translated: as in ‚ÄúThe blind person sees,‚ÄùüîΩ‚ÄúThe blind person looks,‚Äù

original: lta bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa'i rgyu @69a * //üîΩmed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: lta bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa'i rgyu @69a * // med pa bzhin no //
translated: ‚ÄúThe blind person will see.‚Äù

original: 'gro ba rang gi gnas skabs las gzhan du gyur pa dang ldan pa'i dngos po la ni brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa'i rgyu nyid yod de /üîΩgang du de zhugs zin pa de ni song ba yin la /
analyzed: 'gro ba rang gi gnas skabs las gzhan du gyur pa dang ldan pa'i dngos po la ni brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa'i rgyu nyid yod de / gang du de zhugs zin pa de ni song ba yin la /
translated: There is a cause for the application of the term ‚Äúgoing‚Äù to an entity that possesses the state of being other than its prior state.üîΩThat in which it has already been applied is ‚Äúthat gone over.‚Äù

original: gang du de 'jug pa de ni bgom pa yin /
analyzed: gang du de 'jug pa de ni bgom pa yin /
translated: That in which it is being applied is ‚Äúthat being gone over.‚Äù

original: gang du de ma zhugs pa de ni ma song ba yin pas de'i phyir ji skad smras pa'i gtan tshigs kyi mthu nyid kyis 'gro ba yod pa kho na yin pas skabs kyi don 'grub bo //
analyzed: gang du de ma zhugs pa de ni ma song ba yin pas de'i phyir ji skad smras pa'i gtan tshigs kyi mthu nyid kyis 'gro ba yod pa kho na yin pas skabs kyi don 'grub bo //
translated: But since where it has not yet gone is where it has not yet gone, therefore, by the power of the argument stated earlier, going exists. Thus the point of the present context is established.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i skye ba yod par gyur na ni gang du de zhugs zin pa de ni song ba yin la /
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'gro ba'i skye ba yod par gyur na ni gang du de zhugs zin pa de ni song ba yin la /
translated: If the arising of going existed, then where it has already gone would be where it has gone.

original: gang du de 'jug pa de ni bgom pa yin /
analyzed: gang du de 'jug pa de ni bgom pa yin /
translated: Where it is going would be where it is being gone over.üîΩAnd where it has not yet gone would be where it has not yet gone.

original: gang du de ma zhugs pa de ni ma song ba yin no zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ba zhig na 'gro ba yang med do zhes bstan zin to //
analyzed: gang du de ma zhugs pa de ni ma song ba yin no zhes bya bar yang 'gyur ba zhig na 'gro ba yang med do zhes bstan zin to //
translated: But as it has been explained, going does not exist.

original: 'gro ba yod par gyur na yang //
analyzed: 'gro ba yod par gyur na yang //
translated: Even if going existed,

original: 'gro ba rtsom pa'i snga rol na //
analyzed: 'gro ba rtsom pa'i snga rol na //
translated: prior to the commencement of going,

original: gang du 'gro ba rtsom 'gyur ba //
analyzed: gang du 'gro ba rtsom 'gyur ba //
translated: where would the commencement of going occur?

original: bgom pa med cing song ba med //
analyzed: bgom pa med cing song ba med //
translated: Where it is being gone over does not exist, and where it has been gone over does not exist.

original: ma song 'gro ba ga la yod //
analyzed: ma song 'gro ba ga la yod //
translated: How could going exist where it has not yet gone?

original: 'gro ba rtsom pa'i snga rol na //
analyzed: 'gro ba rtsom pa'i snga rol na //
translated: Prior to the commencement of going,

original: gang du 'gro ba rtsom par 'gyur pa'i bgom pa med cing 'gro bas stong ngo //
analyzed: gang du 'gro ba rtsom par 'gyur pa'i bgom pa med cing 'gro bas stong ngo //
translated: Where one begins to go is not a path being traversed, and is empty of going.

original: song ba yang med de /
analyzed: song ba yang med de /
translated: Nor is there a place where one has gone,

original: 'gro ba dang mi ldan pa la de mi 'thad do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: 'gro ba dang mi ldan pa la de mi 'thad do zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: because that is untenable for one who is not engaged in going.

original: de ltar 'gro bas stong na 'gro ba mi 'thad par ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa sngar bstan pa dag yod pas dam bcas pa la rjes su dpag pas gnod pa'i phyir ma song ba la 'gro ba ga la yod de 'gro ba med do zhes bya ba'i
analyzed: de ltar 'gro bas stong na 'gro ba mi 'thad par ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa sngar bstan pa dag yod pas dam bcas pa la rjes su dpag pas gnod pa'i phyir ma song ba la 'gro ba ga la yod de 'gro ba med do zhes bya ba'i
translated: Thus, since the previously stated inferences show that going is untenable when empty of going, then since the thesis is undermined by those inferences, how could there be going where one has not gone?

original: tha tshig go //
analyzed: tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that there is no going.

original: de'i phyir de ltar gang gi tshe don dam par 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ji ltar yang mi srid pa de'i tshe /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar gang gi tshe don dam par 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ji ltar yang mi srid pa de'i tshe /
translated: Therefore, since in this way the conception of going is not possible in any way in an ultimate sense,

original: 'gro rtsom rnam pa thams cad du //
analyzed: 'gro rtsom rnam pa thams cad du //
translated: The beginning of going is not seen in any way.

original: snang ba med pa nyid yin na //üîΩsong ba ci zhig bgom pa ci //
analyzed: snang ba med pa nyid yin na // song ba ci zhig bgom pa ci //
translated: If it is not seen,üîΩWhat is a place where one has gone? What is a place where one has not gone?

original: ma song ci zhes rnam par brtag / nyid yin na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i don te /
analyzed: ma song ci zhes rnam par brtag / nyid yin na zhes bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i don te /
translated: The word ‚Äúonly‚Äù means ‚Äúexclusively.‚Äù

original: 'dir snang ba med pa nyid yin na zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o //üîΩgzhan du na 'gro ba nyid kyi yin gyi //
analyzed: 'dir snang ba med pa nyid yin na zhes bya bar blta bar bya'o // gzhan du na 'gro ba nyid kyi yin gyi //
translated: Here, one should read ‚Äúif there were no going‚Äù instead of ‚Äúif there were no non-going.

original: gzhan gyi ma yin par shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan gyi ma yin par shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: ‚Äù Otherwise, it would be understood that there is going for one who has it, but not for another.

original: rab rib can sgra dang sbrang bu dang / sbrang bu ma chu rings la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa la rnam par rtog pa dang 'dra'o //
analyzed: rab rib can sgra dang sbrang bu dang / sbrang bu ma chu rings la sogs pa yang dag pa ma yin pa la rnam par rtog pa dang 'dra'o //
translated: It is like the case of the man with cataracts who imagines that he sees hairs, flies, and so on.

original: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir bus skra 'greng gi mdung thung bzhin du khyod la skyon de nyid rjes su 'brang ngo //
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir bus skra 'greng gi mdung thung bzhin du khyod la skyon de nyid rjes su 'brang ngo //
translated: Since there is no going, the fault that you have urged on us will rebound on you, just like a ball thrown on a wall.

original: gzhan dag na re don dam par 'gro ba yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re don dam par 'gro ba yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: Others say that going does exist ultimately,

original: mi mthun pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mi mthun pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the opposite exists.

original: 'di na gang dang gang la mi mthun pa yod pa de dang de yod par snang ste /
analyzed: 'di na gang dang gang la mi mthun pa yod pa de dang de yod par snang ste /
translated: Whatever exists is perceived as opposite to what does not exist.

original: dger na snang ba'i mi mthun pa mun pa yod pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dger na snang ba'i mi mthun pa mun pa yod pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, light, which is the opposite of darkness, exists.

original: 'gro @69b ba la yang mi mthun pa sdod pa yod pas de'i phyir 'gro ba yod pa kho na'o zhes zer ro //
analyzed: 'gro @69b ba la yang mi mthun pa sdod pa yod pas de'i phyir 'gro ba yod pa kho na'o zhes zer ro //
translated: Since the opposite of going, namely, resting, exists, therefore going exists.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here, we will explain:

original: de yang khyod la brgal zhing brtag pa yod de khyod sdod pa su'i yin par sems ci 'gro ba po'i yin nam 'on te 'gro ba po ma yin pa'i yin /
analyzed: de yang khyod la brgal zhing brtag pa yod de khyod sdod pa su'i yin par sems ci 'gro ba po'i yin nam 'on te 'gro ba po ma yin pa'i yin /
translated: You have a fallacy and you should investigate whether the resting is of the goer or of that which is not a goer.

original: de la gal te 'gro ba po'i yin snyam na /
analyzed: de la gal te 'gro ba po'i yin snyam na /
translated: If you think it is the goer‚Äôs,

original: re zhig 'gro ba po mi sdod de /
analyzed: re zhig 'gro ba po mi sdod de /
translated: then first, the goer does not rest.

original: re zhig ces bya ba'i sgra ni rim pa la ltos pa'o //
analyzed: re zhig ces bya ba'i sgra ni rim pa la ltos pa'o //
translated: The word ‚Äúfirst‚Äù refers to the order.

original: 'gro ba po mi sdod de zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba nye bar gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: 'gro ba po mi sdod de zhes bya ba ni dam bca' ba nye bar gzhag pa'o //
translated: The goer does not rest means that the thesis is presented.

original: 'gro ba po'i chos ni bya ba dang ldan pa nyid yin pas /
analyzed: 'gro ba po'i chos ni bya ba dang ldan pa nyid yin pas /
translated: The property of the goer is the mere state of having activity.

original: phyogs kyi chos mngon no //
analyzed: phyogs kyi chos mngon no //
translated: The property of the position is evident.

original: dpe ni de'i dbang gis te /
analyzed: dpe ni de'i dbang gis te /
translated: The example is by the power of that.

original: 'gro ba po 'gro ba ma nyams pa yin no //üîΩ'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par 'gro ba po sdod par mi 'thad de /
analyzed: 'gro ba po 'gro ba ma nyams pa yin no // 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par 'gro ba po sdod par mi 'thad de /
translated: The goer is not devoid of going.

original: 'gro ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir lhas byin 'gro ba ma nyams pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir lhas byin 'gro ba ma nyams pa bzhin no //
translated: Here the inference is: Ultimately, it is not tenable that the goer rests, because he is one who possesses the action of going, just as Devadatta, who is not devoid of going, does not rest.

original: ci ste 'gro ba po ma yin pa'i yin no snyam na /
analyzed: ci ste 'gro ba po ma yin pa'i yin no snyam na /
translated: But if you think that the resting is of that which is not a goer,üîΩthen in response to that, NƒÅgƒÅrjuna explains:

original: 'gro ba po min sdod pa min //
analyzed: 'gro ba po min sdod pa min //
translated: Not a goer, not a non-goer,

original: 'gro ba dang bral ba la ni tha snyad du yang 'gro ba ldog pa mi 'thad pas de mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: 'gro ba dang bral ba la ni tha snyad du yang 'gro ba ldog pa mi 'thad pas de mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Since it is untenable to conventionally stop going for one who is devoid of going, it is impossible.

original: ci ste legs par ma zin pa'i gdon gyis brlams pa'i dbang gis gzhan zhig sdod par sems na grogs so //
analyzed: ci ste legs par ma zin pa'i gdon gyis brlams pa'i dbang gis gzhan zhig sdod par sems na grogs so //
translated: But if you think that someone else is standing due to the power of being possessed by a demon that has not been properly exorcized, then I agree.

original: 'gro po 'gro po min las gzhan //
analyzed: 'gro po 'gro po min las gzhan //
translated: Apart from a goer and a non-goer,

original: gsum pa gang zhig sdod par 'gyur //
analyzed: gsum pa gang zhig sdod par 'gyur //
translated: What third person stands?

original: de da smros shig 'ga' yang sdod par mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to //üîΩyang na / re zhig 'gro po sdod do zhes //
analyzed: de da smros shig 'ga' yang sdod par mi 'thad do zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don to // yang na / re zhig 'gro po sdod do zhes //
translated: Say what that is! It is not tenable that anyone stands.

original: ji ltar 'thad pa nyid du 'gyur //üîΩ'gro ba med na 'gro ba po //
analyzed: ji ltar 'thad pa nyid du 'gyur // 'gro ba med na 'gro ba po //
translated: How could it be tenableüîΩTo say ‚ÄúThe goer rests‚Äù?üîΩWithout going,

original: nam yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nam yang 'thad par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: The goer is never tenable.

original: bya ba gnyis dus gcig tu 'gal bas mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: bya ba gnyis dus gcig tu 'gal bas mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Since it is impossible for two actions to occur simultaneously, this is the intended meaning.

original: de ltar na tshig des ni sdod pa po 'gro ba dang bral ba nyid du bstan pas 'gro ba po sdod do zhes bya ba'i tha snyad mi srid par bstan to //
analyzed: de ltar na tshig des ni sdod pa po 'gro ba dang bral ba nyid du bstan pas 'gro ba po sdod do zhes bya ba'i tha snyad mi srid par bstan to //
translated: Thus, since the word ‚Äústaying‚Äù indicates that the one who stays is devoid of going, it is impossible to say that the goer stays.

original: gal te rdza mkhan bzhin du dus gsum gyi nus pa'i gnas skabs yod pa'i phyir 'gro ba dang bral ba yang 'gro ba po nyid du 'grub pas skyon med do zhe na /
analyzed: gal te rdza mkhan bzhin du dus gsum gyi nus pa'i gnas skabs yod pa'i phyir 'gro ba dang bral ba yang 'gro ba po nyid du 'grub pas skyon med do zhe na /
translated: But if you say that the goer is established as the one who stays, because he has the capacity for the three times, like a potter, then there is no error.

original: nye bar gdags pa khas blangs pa'i phyir khas blangs pa nyams pas des na snga ma bzhin du gtan tshigs dang po'i skyon yod par thal bar 'gyur ro //
analyzed: nye bar gdags pa khas blangs pa'i phyir khas blangs pa nyams pas des na snga ma bzhin du gtan tshigs dang po'i skyon yod par thal bar 'gyur ro //
translated: But since you accept the designation, you have undermined your own position, and so, as before, the error in the first reason still applies.

original: yang na sun dbyung ba'i lam gzhan yang yod de /
analyzed: yang na sun dbyung ba'i lam gzhan yang yod de /
translated: Or, there is another way to refute this.

original: 'di la sdod pa de song ba las sam /üîΩma song ba las sam /
analyzed: 'di la sdod pa de song ba las sam / ma song ba las sam /
translated: In this regard, does the one who stays stop from where he has gone,üîΩor from where he has not gone,

original: bgom pa las ldog pa la brtag grang na /
analyzed: bgom pa las ldog pa la brtag grang na /
translated: or from where he is going?

original: de la / bgom las sdod par mi 'gyur te //
analyzed: de la / bgom las sdod par mi 'gyur te //
translated: He does not stay where he has gone,

original: song dang ma song las kyang min //
analyzed: song dang ma song las kyang min //
translated: Nor where he has not gone.

original: bgom pa las sdod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: bgom pa las sdod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: He does not stay where he has gone,

original: rjes su dpag pa sngar bstan pas 'gro ba dang ldan pa la sdod @70a * //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa sngar bstan pas 'gro ba dang ldan pa la sdod @70a * //
translated: And since it has been previously established that going exists, it is untenable to say that it is the opposite of going.üîΩ

original: pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: and because it is untenable that one who possesses going stands, as previously explained by the inference.

original: gal te song ba las de 'grub bo zhe na /
analyzed: gal te song ba las de 'grub bo zhe na /
translated: If you think that it is established from that gone over,

original: song ba las kyang de 'grub pa mi rigs te /
analyzed: song ba las kyang de 'grub pa mi rigs te /
translated: it is not tenable that it is established from that gone over,

original: song ba 'gro ba med pa la 'gro ba ldog pa'i sdod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: song ba 'gro ba med pa la 'gro ba ldog pa'i sdod pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because where there is no going on that gone over, there is no standing of one who has stopped going.

original: 'o na ma song ba las sdod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro snyam na /
analyzed: 'o na ma song ba las sdod pa 'grub par 'gyur ro snyam na /
translated: If you think that standing is established from that not gone over,

original: de yang mi 'thad de /
analyzed: de yang mi 'thad de /
translated: that also is not tenable,

original: 'gro ba med pa la ldog pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa la ldog pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because where there is no going, stopping is impossible.

original: de lta bas na ma song ba las kyang sdod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de lta bas na ma song ba las kyang sdod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Thus, standing does not occur from that not gone over.

original: de lta na gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dang / rjes su 'gro ba yang med de /
analyzed: de lta na gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid dang / rjes su 'gro ba yang med de /
translated: In that case, the meaning of the reason is not established, and there is no forward pervasion,

original: don dam par snang ba dang mun pa gnyis mi mthun pa nyid yin par khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par snang ba dang mun pa gnyis mi mthun pa nyid yin par khas ma blangs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because in reality light and darkness are not accepted as being incompatible.

original: yang na don 'gal ba nyid kyang yin no //
analyzed: yang na don 'gal ba nyid kyang yin no //
translated: Or, the meaning is contradictory.

original: gang dag sdod pa ni yod pa kho na yin te /
analyzed: gang dag sdod pa ni yod pa kho na yin te /
translated: Those who say that standing definitely exists

original: mi mthun pa yod pa'i phyir dang / rtsom pa yod pa'i phyir dang / de las ldog pas dngos po skye ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ba de dag la /
analyzed: mi mthun pa yod pa'i phyir dang / rtsom pa yod pa'i phyir dang / de las ldog pas dngos po skye ba'i phyir ro zhes zer ba de dag la /
translated: Because they are incompatible, because the beginning of going exists, and because the opposite of that is the arising of things.

original: 'gro ba dang ni 'jug pa dang // ldog pa yang ni 'gro dang mtshungs //üîΩzhes brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang ni 'jug pa dang // ldog pa yang ni 'gro dang mtshungs // zhes brjod par bya ste /
translated: Reply: Going, beginning, and stopping are similar to going.

original: ji ltar 'gro ba'i mi mthun pa 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba po ma yin pa dang / de las gzhan pa la mi 'thad pa dang / 'gro ba'i rtsom pa yang song ba dang / ma song ba dang / bgom pa la mi 'thad pa dang 'gro ba'i ldog pa yang song ba dang ma song ba dang bgom pa la mi mthun pa de bzhin du sdod pa'i mi mthun pa yang sdod pa po dang /
analyzed: ji ltar 'gro ba'i mi mthun pa 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba po ma yin pa dang / de las gzhan pa la mi 'thad pa dang / 'gro ba'i rtsom pa yang song ba dang / ma song ba dang / bgom pa la mi 'thad pa dang 'gro ba'i ldog pa yang song ba dang ma song ba dang bgom pa la mi mthun pa de bzhin du sdod pa'i mi mthun pa yang sdod pa po dang /
translated: Just as the incompatibility of going is untenable for one who is a goer, for one who is not a goer, and for one who is different from that, and just as the beginning of going is untenable for one who has gone, for one who has not gone, and for one who is going, and just as the stopping of going is untenable for one who has gone, for one who has not gone, and for one who is going, so too the incompatibility of resting is untenable for one who is a resister,

original: sdod pa po ma yin pa dang / de las gzhan pa la mi 'thad pa dang / sdod pa'i 'jug pa yang bsdad pa dang / ma bsdad pa dang / sdod pa la mi 'thad pa dang / sdod pa'i ldog pa yang bsdad pa dang /
analyzed: sdod pa po ma yin pa dang / de las gzhan pa la mi 'thad pa dang / sdod pa'i 'jug pa yang bsdad pa dang / ma bsdad pa dang / sdod pa la mi 'thad pa dang / sdod pa'i ldog pa yang bsdad pa dang /
translated: The reversal of resting is also untenable in that which is at rest, in that which is not at rest, and in that which is in the process of resting.

original: ma bsdad pa dang / sdod pa la mi 'thad pa de ltar rjes su dpag pa rgyas par bya'o //
analyzed: ma bsdad pa dang / sdod pa la mi 'thad pa de ltar rjes su dpag pa rgyas par bya'o //
translated: This should be extensively inferred.

original: tshig mangs kyis dogs pa'i phyir dang // don bshad zin pa'i phyir spros pa'i sgo nas ma bshad de /
analyzed: tshig mangs kyis dogs pa'i phyir dang // don bshad zin pa'i phyir spros pa'i sgo nas ma bshad de /
translated: Because it would lengthen the text excessively and because the meaning has already been explained, I will not elaborate further.

original: 'on kyang phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o //üîΩsdod pa po mi 'gro ste /
analyzed: 'on kyang phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o // sdod pa po mi 'gro ste /
translated: However, I will explain just a little.

original: 'gro ba dang bral ba'i phyir sdod pa ma nyams pa'i sdod pa po gzhan bzhin no //üîΩbsdad pa la sdod pa'i 'jug pa med de /
analyzed: 'gro ba dang bral ba'i phyir sdod pa ma nyams pa'i sdod pa po gzhan bzhin no // bsdad pa la sdod pa'i 'jug pa med de /
translated: The goer does not rest because he is devoid of going, like another goer who is not resting.

original: bsdad zin pa'i phyir dper na bsdad nas yun ring du lon pa bzhin no //üîΩbsdad pa las sdod pa mi ldog ste /
analyzed: bsdad zin pa'i phyir dper na bsdad nas yun ring du lon pa bzhin no // bsdad pa las sdod pa mi ldog ste /
translated: There is no engagement of resting in that which is at rest because it has already rested, like one who has rested for a long time.

original: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'gro ba med pa'i phyir /
translated: There is no reversal of resting in that which is at rest because there is no going.

original: dper na / sdod pa ma nyams pa gzhan bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na / sdod pa ma nyams pa gzhan bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like another who has not yet stopped.

original: de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la yang rjes su dpag pa'i sbyor ba ci rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du lhag ma rnams la yang rjes su dpag pa'i sbyor ba ci rigs par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, one should infer the remaining [cases] in accordance with the appropriate application.

original: de'i phyir de ltar sdod pa ma grub pa'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i skyon las nges par thar pa med do //üîΩ'dir smras pa /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar sdod pa ma grub pa'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i skyon las nges par thar pa med do // 'dir smras pa /
translated: Therefore, since stopping is not established in that way, one is not definitely free from the faults explained above.üîΩHere, someone might say this:

original: khyed na @70b re /
analyzed: khyed na @70b re /
translated: You say,

original: 'gro ba po yang med la 'gro ba yang med do zhes zer bas tsee tra 'gro'o zhes 'jig rten la grags pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir grags pa'i gnod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'gro ba po yang med la 'gro ba yang med do zhes zer bas tsee tra 'gro'o zhes 'jig rten la grags pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir grags pa'i gnod par 'gyur te /
translated: ‚ÄúThere is no goer and there is also no going.‚Äù Since you eliminate what is renowned in the world, namely, ‚ÄúCaitra goes,‚Äù you are undermined by what is renowned.

original: dper na / 'jig rten la ri bong can zla ba nyid du grags bzhin du zla ba ma yin pa sel bar byed pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na / 'jig rten la ri bong can zla ba nyid du grags bzhin du zla ba ma yin pa sel bar byed pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, it is like eliminating the moon, which is renowned in the world as ‚Äúthe one with the rabbit,‚Äù as not being the moon.

original: bshad pa / 'dir gtan tshigs kyi don gang yin /
analyzed: bshad pa / 'dir gtan tshigs kyi don gang yin /
translated: In response to this, we ask: What is the meaning of the reason here?

original: ci 'jig rten la grags pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir ram /
analyzed: ci 'jig rten la grags pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir ram /
translated: Is it because you eliminate what is renowned in the world?

original: 'on te bstan bcos la grags pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'on te bstan bcos la grags pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir /
translated: Or is it because you eliminate what is renowned in treatises?

original: des cir 'gyur /
analyzed: des cir 'gyur /
translated: What follows from that?

original: 'jig rten la grags pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid de /
analyzed: 'jig rten la grags pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir ro zhe na ni gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid de /
translated: If you say, ‚ÄúBecause it eliminates what is renowned in the world,‚Äù then the meaning of your reason is not established.

original: don dam par ro zhes dam bcas pa'i khyad par nye bar blangs pa kho na'i phyir /
analyzed: don dam par ro zhes dam bcas pa'i khyad par nye bar blangs pa kho na'i phyir /
translated: Because you have merely accepted the distinction ‚Äúultimately,‚Äù

original: 'jig rten la grags pa'i 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba'i tha snyad ma spangs pa'i phyir ro //üîΩgal te rang gi bstan bcos la grags pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir de grags pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro zhe na ni /
analyzed: 'jig rten la grags pa'i 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba'i tha snyad ma spangs pa'i phyir ro // gal te rang gi bstan bcos la grags pa sel bar byed pa'i phyir de grags pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro zhe na ni /
translated: you have not abandoned the conventions of a goer and going that are renowned in the world.üîΩIf you say, ‚ÄúBecause it eliminates what is renowned in our treatise, it is undermined by what is renowned,‚Äù

original: khas blangs pa la gnod par 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya ba'i rigs te /
analyzed: khas blangs pa la gnod par 'gyur ro zhes brjod par bya ba'i rigs te /
translated: it is correct to say that it undermines your assertion.

original: de yang kho bo cag la gnas mi rnyed de /
analyzed: de yang kho bo cag la gnas mi rnyed de /
translated: But we do not commit that error.

original: don dam par 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba gnyis yod par khas ma blangs pa'i phyir dang / de dag mi 'thad par yang sngar bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba gnyis yod par khas ma blangs pa'i phyir dang / de dag mi 'thad par yang sngar bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because we do not accept that ultimately both a goer and going exist, and because we have already shown that they are untenable.

original: yang bshad pa /
analyzed: yang bshad pa /
translated: Again, it is said:

original: don dam par 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba grub par gyur na /
analyzed: don dam par 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba grub par gyur na /
translated: If a goer and going were to exist ultimately,

original: nges par gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid du 'gyur grang na de yang mi 'thad do //
analyzed: nges par gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid du 'gyur grang na de yang mi 'thad do //
translated: But that is untenable.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How so?

original: de nyid brtag par bya ste /
analyzed: de nyid brtag par bya ste /
translated: That should be investigated.

original: 'gro ba de dang 'gro ba po //
analyzed: 'gro ba de dang 'gro ba po //
translated: The goer and the going

original: de nyid ces kyang byar mi rung //
analyzed: de nyid ces kyang byar mi rung //
translated: cannot be said to be identical.

original: 'gro ba dang ni 'gro ba po //
analyzed: 'gro ba dang ni 'gro ba po //
translated: The goer and the going

original: gzhan nyid ces kyang byar mi rung //
analyzed: gzhan nyid ces kyang byar mi rung //
translated: cannot be said to be different.

original: de ni dam bca' ba gnyis nye bar gzhag pa'o //
analyzed: de ni dam bca' ba gnyis nye bar gzhag pa'o //
translated: This is the presentation of the two theses.

original: ji ltar mi rung zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar mi rung zhe na /
translated: How are they untenable?

original: gal te 'gro ba gang yin pa //
analyzed: gal te 'gro ba gang yin pa //
translated: If the goer is the going,

original: de nyid 'gro bo yin gyur na //
analyzed: de nyid 'gro bo yin gyur na //
translated: then the goer would be the action.

original: byed pa po dang las nyid kyang //
analyzed: byed pa po dang las nyid kyang //
translated: The agent and the action

original: gcig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur //üîΩde ltar na 'dir glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: gcig pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur // de ltar na 'dir glags yod pa'i tshig yin pa'i phyir /
translated: would be identical.

original: skabs kyi don dgag pa nus shing bzlog pa'i don gsal ba'i tshig gi don to //
analyzed: skabs kyi don dgag pa nus shing bzlog pa'i don gsal ba'i tshig gi don to //
translated: In this way, because this is a statement that is open to dispute, the meaning of the statement is clear: the meaning of the statement is that the meaning of the passage is refuted and reversed.

original: dper na gal te spra rtag na bum pa yang rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur te bum pa byas pa mi rtag pa ni rtag pa nyid du mi 'dod de /
analyzed: dper na gal te spra rtag na bum pa yang rtag pa nyid du thal bar 'gyur te bum pa byas pa mi rtag pa ni rtag pa nyid du mi 'dod de /
translated: For example, if a monkey is permanent, then it follows that a pot would also be permanent, because a produced impermanent pot is not asserted to be permanent.

original: de'i phyir sgra ni mi rtag ste /
analyzed: de'i phyir sgra ni mi rtag ste /
translated: Therefore sound is impermanent,

original: byas pa'i phyir dper na bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: byas pa'i phyir dper na bum pa bzhin no zhes bya ba lta bu'o //
translated: because it is produced, like a pot.

original: de'i phyir 'dir tshig gi don gyi dbang gis sbyor ba'i tshig ni don dam par 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba gcig pa nyid ma yin te /üîΩbyed pa po dang las yin pa'i phyir dper na gcod pa po dang gcad @71a * //
analyzed: de'i phyir 'dir tshig gi don gyi dbang gis sbyor ba'i tshig ni don dam par 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba gcig pa nyid ma yin te / byed pa po dang las yin pa'i phyir dper na gcod pa po dang gcad @71a * //
translated: Therefore, in this context, the statement of the syllogism by way of the meaning of the words is: Ultimately, the goer and going are not the same,

original: pa bzhin no //
analyzed: pa bzhin no //
translated: because one is the agent and the other is the object, like the cutter and the cut.üîΩThe goer and going are not the same.

original: 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba gcig pa nyid ma yin no zhes bshad kyang de gnyis gzhan pa nyid du bstan pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba gcig pa nyid ma yin no zhes bshad kyang de gnyis gzhan pa nyid du bstan pa ma yin no //
translated: Although this is explained, it does not teach that the two are different.

original: gzhan dag ni dam bcas pa'i don rnam par brtags na gcig la gcig nus pas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhan pa nyid gcod pa po dang / bcad pa la med pa'i phyir dpe med do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag ni dam bcas pa'i don rnam par brtags na gcig la gcig nus pas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyi gzhan pa nyid gcod pa po dang / bcad pa la med pa'i phyir dpe med do zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say: The meaning of the thesis is that when analyzed, the other is empty of the capacity to be one and different, and the example is not established because the other does not exist as the cutter and the cut.

original: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: That is not good.

original: gcig pa nyid tsam dgag pa'i phyir dang / de yang gcod pa po dang bcad pa'i gsal ba tha dad pa'i phyir grags pa kho na'o //
analyzed: gcig pa nyid tsam dgag pa'i phyir dang / de yang gcod pa po dang bcad pa'i gsal ba tha dad pa'i phyir grags pa kho na'o //
translated: Because it is merely the negation of sameness, and because the cutter and the cut are different manifestations, it is well known.

original: gcig la gcig nus pas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyang dam bcas pa'i don khas blangs nas rtogs par bya ba dang / rtogs par byed pa kun rdzob tu gcig la gcig nus pas stong pa'i phyir grub pa dag kho na dpe nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir dpe med pa ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig la gcig nus pas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid kyang dam bcas pa'i don khas blangs nas rtogs par bya ba dang / rtogs par byed pa kun rdzob tu gcig la gcig nus pas stong pa'i phyir grub pa dag kho na dpe nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir dpe med pa ma yin no //
translated: The other is empty of the capacity to be one and different, and the example is not established because the thesis is accepted and the object to be understood and the means of understanding are conventionally empty of the capacity to be one and different.

original: ci ste yang don dam par gcod pa po dang / bcad pa gzhan pa nyid ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ste yang don dam par gcod pa po dang / bcad pa gzhan pa nyid ma yin te /
translated: But if the cutter and the cut are not different in the ultimate,

original: dpag tu yod pa'i phyir bcad pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin pas de'i phyir 'gal ba 'khrul pa med pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: dpag tu yod pa'i phyir bcad pa'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin pas de'i phyir 'gal ba 'khrul pa med pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: Because it is finite, like the nature of what is cut. Therefore, there is the fault of the irrelevance of the contradiction.

original: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That also is not correct,

original: bcad pa'i rang gi bdag nyid gzhan pa nyid ma yin par ma grub pa'i phyir 'gal ba 'khrul pa med pa'i gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: bcad pa'i rang gi bdag nyid gzhan pa nyid ma yin par ma grub pa'i phyir 'gal ba 'khrul pa med pa'i gnod par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because the fault of the irrelevance of the contradiction does not arise, since the nature of what is cut is not established as being different.

original: 'gal ba 'khrul pa med pa'i gnod pa yod du zin na yang gcig pa nyid dang tha dad pa nyid kyi mtha' gnyis la me 'chel bas don dam par ni sgrub pa ston par 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa 'grub bo //
analyzed: 'gal ba 'khrul pa med pa'i gnod pa yod du zin na yang gcig pa nyid dang tha dad pa nyid kyi mtha' gnyis la me 'chel bas don dam par ni sgrub pa ston par 'dod pa'i phyir 'dod pa 'grub bo //
translated: Even if there were the fault of the irrelevance of the contradiction, since the two extremes of sameness and difference are excluded, the intended meaning is established ultimately, since it is taught as a proof.

original: tha snyad du gcig pa nyid sgrub na ni grags pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: tha snyad du gcig pa nyid sgrub na ni grags pa'i gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: If sameness is established conventionally, there is the fault of contradiction with what is commonly acknowledged.

original: ci ste yang dam bca' ba'i don sgro btags nas 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba gcig pa nyid ma yin no zhes bshad pas /
analyzed: ci ste yang dam bca' ba'i don sgro btags nas 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba gcig pa nyid ma yin no zhes bshad pas /
translated: But if the meaning of the thesis is refuted by superimposition, since it is explained that the goer and going are not the same,

original: 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba gzhan pa nyid du bstan pa yin pas khas blangs pa la gnod par 'gyur ro zhes rgol na de yang de nyid kyis lan btab zin to //
analyzed: 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba gzhan pa nyid du bstan pa yin pas khas blangs pa la gnod par 'gyur ro zhes rgol na de yang de nyid kyis lan btab zin to //
translated: The response to that has already been presented.

original: gang dag ji skad bshad pa'i skyon yongs su spang bar 'dod pas gzhan pa nyid kyi phyogs la brten pa de dgag pa'i phyir dam bca' ba nye bar bzhag pa gnyis pa rab tu bsgrub pa bstan par bya ste /
analyzed: gang dag ji skad bshad pa'i skyon yongs su spang bar 'dod pas gzhan pa nyid kyi phyogs la brten pa de dgag pa'i phyir dam bca' ba nye bar bzhag pa gnyis pa rab tu bsgrub pa bstan par bya ste /
translated: Those who wish to completely avoid the errors explained above rely on the position of difference. In order to refute that, the second premise should be presented.

original: 'du byed kyi tshigs dang rgyu rkyen so sor nges pa yod na 'byung ba ngo bo nyid tha dad du bya ba'i gzhir gyur pa thog ma med pa'i dus nas 'jug pa'i spros pa'i bag chags dang / sa bon dang / rgyu las byung ba yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa'i dbang gis yul gzhan du bar chad med par skye ba la /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi tshigs dang rgyu rkyen so sor nges pa yod na 'byung ba ngo bo nyid tha dad du bya ba'i gzhir gyur pa thog ma med pa'i dus nas 'jug pa'i spros pa'i bag chags dang / sa bon dang / rgyu las byung ba yang dag pa ma yin pa kun rtog pa'i dbang gis yul gzhan du bar chad med par skye ba la /
translated: If there were a definite connection between the parts of a composite and its causes and conditions, then the basis of the activity of the different natures would be the beginningless habitual propensities of conceptualization, the seeds, and the causes that arise without interruption in other objects due to the power of imagination that is not real.

original: gal te 'gro dang 'gro ba po //
analyzed: gal te 'gro dang 'gro ba po //
translated: If going and the goer

original: @71b gzhan pa nyid du rnam brtag na //
analyzed: @71b gzhan pa nyid du rnam brtag na //
translated: If you imagine that they are different,üîΩ

original: rnam par rtog pa byed na ni //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa byed na ni //
translated: If you imagine that they are different,üîΩthen the going and the goer

original: 'ga' yang bzlog par bya ba ma yin te /üîΩmi 'dod pa thob pa nyid kyis gnod par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'ga' yang bzlog par bya ba ma yin te / mi 'dod pa thob pa nyid kyis gnod par 'gyur ro //
translated: are not in any way mutually dependent.üîΩAnd if you imagine that they are not different, then the goer would go without any going.

original: ci ltar zhe na 'di la 'gro ba dang 'gro ba po gzhan pa nyid du khas len na /
analyzed: ci ltar zhe na 'di la 'gro ba dang 'gro ba po gzhan pa nyid du khas len na /
translated: If you accept that the goer and going are different,üîΩthen there would be going without a goer

original: 'gro po med pa'i 'gro ba dang // 'gro ba med pa'i 'gro bar 'gyur //üîΩgzhan yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'gro po med pa'i 'gro ba dang // 'gro ba med pa'i 'gro bar 'gyur // gzhan yin pa'i phyir /
translated: and a goer without going.

original: dper na / bum pa dang / snam bu rten dang brten pa'i dngos pos rten pa med pa lta bur 'gyur bar dgongs so //
analyzed: dper na / bum pa dang / snam bu rten dang brten pa'i dngos pos rten pa med pa lta bur 'gyur bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that, like a pot and a cloth, they would not be related as supported and supporter.

original: gzhan pa nyid du smra ba yang 'gro ba po med pa'i 'gro ba dang / 'gro ba med pa'i 'gro ba po mi 'dod do //
analyzed: gzhan pa nyid du smra ba yang 'gro ba po med pa'i 'gro ba dang / 'gro ba med pa'i 'gro ba po mi 'dod do //
translated: But the proponent of difference does not accept that there is going without a goer or a goer without going.

original: glags yod pa'i sgo des phyogs kyi chos ni 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yin la bsgrub par bya ba chos ni gzhan pa ma yin pa nyid yin /
analyzed: glags yod pa'i sgo des phyogs kyi chos ni 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yin la bsgrub par bya ba chos ni gzhan pa ma yin pa nyid yin /
translated: The property of the subject is the goer and going that are related to each other. The predicate is that they are not different.

original: dpe ni de'i dbang gis bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i chos grags pa dang ldan pa'i chos can yin par bstan to //
analyzed: dpe ni de'i dbang gis bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i chos grags pa dang ldan pa'i chos can yin par bstan to //
translated: The example is the subject that is renowned for the probandum and the proof.

original: 'dir sbyor ba'i tshig ni don dam par 'gro ba po las 'gro ba gzhan pa nyid ma yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: 'dir sbyor ba'i tshig ni don dam par 'gro ba po las 'gro ba gzhan pa nyid ma yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: Here the statement of the syllogism is: ‚ÄúUltimately, the goer is not different from going,

original: brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa'i ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na /
analyzed: brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa'i ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na /
translated: because the special expression ‚Äògoes‚Äô is used in dependence on it, as is the case, for example,

original: 'gro ba rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
translated: with the goer‚Äôs own self.‚Äù

original: de bzhin du don dam par 'gro ba las kyang 'gro ba po gzhan pa nyid ma yin par nges par gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: de bzhin du don dam par 'gro ba las kyang 'gro ba po gzhan pa nyid ma yin par nges par gzung bar bya ste /
translated: Similarly, ultimately, the goer is ascertained to be not different from going,

original: brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa'i ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na 'gro ba po'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa'i ltos pa dang bcas pa'i phyir dper na 'gro ba po'i rang gi bdag nyid bzhin no //
translated: because the special expression ‚Äògoes‚Äô is used in dependence on it, as is the case, for example, with the goer‚Äôs own self.‚Äù

original: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa ma bstan pa ni de med pa'i phyir /
analyzed: mi mthun pa'i phyogs las ldog pa ma bstan pa ni de med pa'i phyir /
translated: The reverse of the discordant side is not stated because it does not exist.

original: de las ldog pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las ldog pa 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The reverse of that is established.

original: gal te rten dang brten par bcas pa'i 'brel pa rab tu ma grub pa dag la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid ma grub pa'i phyir phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la ma khyab pa nyid yin no zhe na /üîΩde dag la yang tha na 'di ni gzhan no //
analyzed: gal te rten dang brten par bcas pa'i 'brel pa rab tu ma grub pa dag la ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid ma grub pa'i phyir phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la ma khyab pa nyid yin no zhe na / de dag la yang tha na 'di ni gzhan no //
translated: If you say that the reason is not included in the predicate because the relation of support and supported is not established for those that are not established as being related, thenüîΩeven for those, it is certain that a special expression, ‚ÄúThis is different,‚Äù

original: 'di yang gzhan no zhes brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa gdon mi za bar yod pas ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di yang gzhan no zhes brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa gdon mi za bar yod pas ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: and ‚ÄúThat is different,‚Äù is used, and so they are related.

original: skyon med do //
analyzed: skyon med do //
translated: Therefore there is no fault.

original: gang dag la gzhan ma yin pa rnam par bcad pas sam gzhan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir gzhan nyid yin pa de dag la yang /üîΩde la ltos nas 'di ni gzhan no //
analyzed: gang dag la gzhan ma yin pa rnam par bcad pas sam gzhan nyid dang ldan pa'i phyir gzhan nyid yin pa de dag la yang / de la ltos nas 'di ni gzhan no //
translated: For those that are not different by the exclusion of non-difference or by possessing difference,üîΩin dependence on that, it is certain that a special expression, ‚ÄúThis is different,‚Äù

original: 'di yang gzhan no zhes brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa gdon mi za bar yod pas ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: 'di yang gzhan no zhes brjod pa khyad par can 'jug pa gdon mi za bar yod pas ltos pa dang bcas pa nyid yin pa'i phyir /
translated: and ‚ÄúThat is different,‚Äù is used, and so they are related.

original: gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid med do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid med do //
translated: Therefore the reason is not unestablished.

original: rjes su dpag pa ji skad bstan pa nyid kyis gzhan nyid ma grub pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pas ma nges pa @72a * //üîΩnyid kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: rjes su dpag pa ji skad bstan pa nyid kyis gzhan nyid ma grub pa'i phyir mi mthun pa'i phyogs med pas ma nges pa @72a * // nyid kyang ma yin no //
translated: Since difference is not established by the previously explained inference, there is no counterexample, and therefore there is no uncertainty.

original: grags pa'i gnod pa yang med de //
analyzed: grags pa'i gnod pa yang med de //
translated: Nor is there any contradiction with what is commonly accepted,

original: de kho na dpyad pa ni shing rta mkhan la sogs pa blo ma sbyangs pa dag gi dbang du ma byas pa'i phyir dang / sngar bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de kho na dpyad pa ni shing rta mkhan la sogs pa blo ma sbyangs pa dag gi dbang du ma byas pa'i phyir dang / sngar bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the analysis of reality does not take into account the perspective of those whose minds are untrained, such as carpenters, and because this has already been explained.

original: ci ste yang 'gro ba las 'gro ba po gzhan pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: ci ste yang 'gro ba las 'gro ba po gzhan pa nyid yin te /
translated: But if you think that the goer is different from going,

original: tha snyad yod pa'i phyir dper na lhas byin gyi rta zhes bya ba bzhin no snyam na /
analyzed: tha snyad yod pa'i phyir dper na lhas byin gyi rta zhes bya ba bzhin no snyam na /
translated: because it is commonly said, ‚ÄúThe horse of Devadatta,‚Äù

original: de yang bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang bzang po ma yin te /
translated: that is not good reasoning.

original: 'gro ba po'i rang gi bdag nyid ces bya ba /
analyzed: 'gro ba po'i rang gi bdag nyid ces bya ba /
translated: The goer‚Äôs own nature

original: 'gro ba po la grub pas phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la ma grub pa'i phyir dang / 'gro ba po'i rang gi bdag nyid kyis rang la yang ma nges pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba po la grub pas phyogs kyi phyogs gcig la ma grub pa'i phyir dang / 'gro ba po'i rang gi bdag nyid kyis rang la yang ma nges pa nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is not established for the goer, and so it is not established as a part of the subject, and because the goer‚Äôs own nature is uncertain with respect to itself.

original: lhas byin dang / rta yang gzhan pa nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir dpe yang med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lhas byin dang / rta yang gzhan pa nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir dpe yang med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because Devadatta and the horse are not established as different.

original: des blo tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dag gi lan kyang btab pa yin no //üîΩci ste yang blo rnon po'i blo la 'gro ba po lhas byin zhes bya ba'i sgra gang yin pa de ni rang gi bdag nyid las /
analyzed: des blo tha dad pa'i phyir zhes bya ba la sogs pa'i gtan tshigs dag gi lan kyang btab pa yin no // ci ste yang blo rnon po'i blo la 'gro ba po lhas byin zhes bya ba'i sgra gang yin pa de ni rang gi bdag nyid las /
translated: This also answers the argument, ‚Äúbecause the cognition is different.‚Äù

original: gzhan pa'i tshig gi don dang 'brel pa'i yul yin te /
analyzed: gzhan pa'i tshig gi don dang 'brel pa'i yul yin te /
translated: But if the cognition of a sharp intellect is the word ‚ÄúDevadatta,‚Äù the goer, then that is the object of a word that is related to another meaning,

original: 'jug pa dang ldog pa yod pa'i phyir dper na la ba sngon po zhes bya ba'i sgra bzhin no //
analyzed: 'jug pa dang ldog pa yod pa'i phyir dper na la ba sngon po zhes bya ba'i sgra bzhin no //
translated: because it is engaged and disengaged, like the word ‚Äúblue cloth.‚Äù

original: sgra gang la ji skad smos pa'i rnam pa med pa de la ni 'jug pa dang ldog pa med de /
analyzed: sgra gang la ji skad smos pa'i rnam pa med pa de la ni 'jug pa dang ldog pa med de /
translated: The word that does not have the aspect mentioned above is not engaged and disengaged.

original: dper na yod pa nyid kyi sgra ji bzhin no snyam du sems na de las gzhan pa nyid yin par rjes su dpog na rten dang / brten par 'brel ba med pas 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba'i 'brel pa bsal ba'i phyir rjes su dpag pa la gnod do //
analyzed: dper na yod pa nyid kyi sgra ji bzhin no snyam du sems na de las gzhan pa nyid yin par rjes su dpog na rten dang / brten par 'brel ba med pas 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba'i 'brel pa bsal ba'i phyir rjes su dpag pa la gnod do //
translated: If you think that it is inferred that it is different from that, then because there is no connection between the support and the supported, the inference is invalidated in order to eliminate the connection between the goer and going.

original: mi mthun pa rang gi bdag nyid las gzhan pa'i tshig gi don dang ma 'brel pa gzhan dag la yang lhas byin lhas byin zhes bya ba'i sgra 'jug pa dang ldog pa yod pas gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: mi mthun pa rang gi bdag nyid las gzhan pa'i tshig gi don dang ma 'brel pa gzhan dag la yang lhas byin lhas byin zhes bya ba'i sgra 'jug pa dang ldog pa yod pas gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid yin no //
translated: Also, the reason is inconclusive because the word ‚ÄúDevadatta‚Äù is used and stopped in regard to others who are not connected with the meaning of the word ‚Äúdifferent from his own self.‚Äù

original: khyad par du smos na yang gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid yin no //
analyzed: khyad par du smos na yang gtan tshigs kyi don ma grub pa nyid yin no //
translated: And if you specify, then the meaning of the reason is not established.

original: la ba sngon po zhes bya ba'i sgra ji skad smos pa'i yul yin pa yang don dam par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: la ba sngon po zhes bya ba'i sgra ji skad smos pa'i yul yin pa yang don dam par ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the object that is the referent of the word ‚Äúblue cloth‚Äù is not ultimately established.

original: des 'gro ba las 'gro ba po gzhan pa nyid yin no snyam pa'i blo'i phyogs la yang gtan tshigs dang dpe'i skyon gyis lan btab pa yin no //
analyzed: des 'gro ba las 'gro ba po gzhan pa nyid yin no snyam pa'i blo'i phyogs la yang gtan tshigs dang dpe'i skyon gyis lan btab pa yin no //
translated: This also replies to the position of the mind that thinks the goer is different from the going by way of the faults of the reason and example.

original: ci ste gcig pa nyid dgag pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa bstan pas gzhan pa nyid dgag pa'i rjes su dpag pa bstan pa rnams bsal ba'i phyir gzhan pa nyid dgag pa yang mi 'grub bo snyam na gnyi ga dgag pa'i rjes su dpag pa bstan pa'i mthus
analyzed: ci ste gcig pa nyid dgag pa'i phyir rjes su dpag pa bstan pas gzhan pa nyid dgag pa'i rjes su dpag pa bstan pa rnams bsal ba'i phyir gzhan pa nyid dgag pa yang mi 'grub bo snyam na gnyi ga dgag pa'i rjes su dpag pa bstan pa'i mthus
translated: But if you think that because the teaching of the inference refuting identity refutes the teaching of the inference refuting difference, the refutation of difference is not established, then,

original: gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid dgag pas de'i yul can gyi blos skye ba @72b med pa bstan par 'dod pa'i phyir skyon med do //
analyzed: gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid dgag pas de'i yul can gyi blos skye ba @72b med pa bstan par 'dod pa'i phyir skyon med do //
translated: since the force of the teaching of the inference refuting both establishes the refutation of difference and the refutation of identity, and since it is asserted that the cognition that is the object of both is taught to be unborn, there is no error.

original: de'i phyir de ltar 'gro ba las 'gro ba po gzhan pa nyid ma yin par bstan pa la /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar 'gro ba las 'gro ba po gzhan pa nyid ma yin par bstan pa la /
translated: Thus, in this way, the teaching that the goer is not different from the going

original: pha rol pos gzhan pa ma yin pa nyid yin no zhes dam bcas pa'i don log par brtags nas khas blangs pa la gnod pa nye bar brtags pa'i gnod pa med do //
analyzed: pha rol pos gzhan pa ma yin pa nyid yin no zhes dam bcas pa'i don log par brtags nas khas blangs pa la gnod pa nye bar brtags pa'i gnod pa med do //
translated: The opponent‚Äôs assertion that the goer is not different from the nongoer is refuted by the examination of the meaning of the assertion.

original: ci ste yang gzhan zhig rtog pa zhi ba mos 'gro ba po'i rang gi bdag nyid rang las gzhan pa nyid ma yin par ma grub pa'i phyir dpe med par ston par byed na de yang bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: ci ste yang gzhan zhig rtog pa zhi ba mos 'gro ba po'i rang gi bdag nyid rang las gzhan pa nyid ma yin par ma grub pa'i phyir dpe med par ston par byed na de yang bzang po ma yin te /
translated: But if you think that the pacification of conceptualization is the goer‚Äôs own nature, which is not established as different from itself, and that therefore the example is not established, that is not good.

original: 'gro ba po'i rang gi bdag nyid gzhan pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rab tu grub pa nyid kyis dpe nyid du brjod pas skyon med do //
analyzed: 'gro ba po'i rang gi bdag nyid gzhan pa nyid kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong par rab tu grub pa nyid kyis dpe nyid du brjod pas skyon med do //
translated: Because it is well established that the goer‚Äôs own nature is empty of the nature of being different, we have stated it as the example.

original: de'i phyir de ltar gzigs zan dag gis rang gi grub pa'i mtha'i skyon sba bar 'dod pas /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar gzigs zan dag gis rang gi grub pa'i mtha'i skyon sba bar 'dod pas /
translated: Therefore, those who wish to conceal the faults of their own tenets

original: sgrub pa sbyar ba ni kho bo cag la mi gnod do //
analyzed: sgrub pa sbyar ba ni kho bo cag la mi gnod do //
translated: apply the proof to us, but it does not harm us.

original: 'dir gzhan dag na re /
analyzed: 'dir gzhan dag na re /
translated: Here, others say:

original: 'gro ba med do zhes bya ba'i skabs bor nas 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid ma yin no zhes dam 'cha' bar byed pa de ni skabs bor ba dang / ltag chod yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba med do zhes bya ba'i skabs bor nas 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid ma yin no zhes dam 'cha' bar byed pa de ni skabs bor ba dang / ltag chod yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: This is a context that has been discarded, and it is a mere sophistry.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:üîΩThe goer and going are not the same,

original: gang dag dngos po gcig pa dang // dngos po gzhan pa nyid du ni //
analyzed: gang dag dngos po gcig pa dang // dngos po gzhan pa nyid du ni //
translated: Nor are they different.

original: 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid du grub par gyur na de gnyis yod pa nyid du shes par 'gyur ba zhig na /üîΩgang gi tshe ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pas gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid du /
analyzed: 'gro ba po dang 'gro ba gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid du grub par gyur na de gnyis yod pa nyid du shes par 'gyur ba zhig na / gang gi tshe ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pas gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid du /
translated: If the goer and going were established as the same or different, then they would be known to exist.üîΩBut when, by the aforementioned modes, they are not established as the same

original: grub par gyur pa yod min pa //
analyzed: grub par gyur pa yod min pa //
translated: Or different,

original: de gnyis grub pa ji ltar yod //
analyzed: de gnyis grub pa ji ltar yod //
translated: How could they be established as either?

original: de'i phyir de ltar de'i dngos po nyid dgag par 'dod pa'i phyir skabs bor ba yang ma yin la /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar de'i dngos po nyid dgag par 'dod pa'i phyir skabs bor ba yang ma yin la /
translated: Therefore, in this way, because we wish to refute their nature, we have not discarded the context.

original: gcig pa nyid la sogs par yongs su rtog pa nyid bkag pa'i phyir ltag chod kyang ma yin no //
analyzed: gcig pa nyid la sogs par yongs su rtog pa nyid bkag pa'i phyir ltag chod kyang ma yin no //
translated: It is not a reductio argument, because the intrinsic reality of the goer and the act of going are refuted.

original: gzhan dag na re gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid du nges par bzung bar mi nus su zin kyang 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba 'grub pas ji skad bshad pa'i skyon med do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid du nges par bzung bar mi nus su zin kyang 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba 'grub pas ji skad bshad pa'i skyon med do zhes zer ro //
translated: Others say: Even though it is impossible to ascertain that the goer and going are the same or different, the goer and going are established.

original: de la yang lan de nyid yin te /
analyzed: de la yang lan de nyid yin te /
translated: The response to that is the same:üîΩThe goer is not the same as the going,

original: gang dag dngos po gcig pa dang // dngos po gzhan pa nyid du ni //
analyzed: gang dag dngos po gcig pa dang // dngos po gzhan pa nyid du ni //
translated: and the goer is not different from the going.

original: de gnyis tha snyad du ni yod pa nyid du shes par nus kyi khyed ni don dam par 'dod pas gal te gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid du /
analyzed: de gnyis tha snyad du ni yod pa nyid du shes par nus kyi khyed ni don dam par 'dod pas gal te gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid du /
translated: You may be able to understand that the goer and going exist conventionally as the same or different, but since you assert them ultimately, if the goer and going were the same or different,

original: grub par gyur pa yod min pa //
analyzed: grub par gyur pa yod min pa //
translated: then the goer and going would not be established.

original: de gnyis grub pa ji ltar yod //
analyzed: de gnyis grub pa ji ltar yod //
translated: How could those two be established?

original: med pa nyid de gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid du med pa la ni yod pa nyid du ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: med pa nyid de gcig pa nyid dang / gzhan pa nyid du med pa la ni yod pa nyid du ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Because it is impossible to demonstrate the existence of that which is nonexistent as one or different.

original: mkhas par rlos @73a * //üîΩpa gzhan dag ni don dam par 'gro ba po mi 'gro ste /üîΩbya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir sdod pa po bzhin te zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du don dam par 'gro ba po sdod par mi 'thad de /
analyzed: mkhas par rlos @73a * // pa gzhan dag ni don dam par 'gro ba po mi 'gro ste / bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir sdod pa po bzhin te zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du don dam par 'gro ba po sdod par mi 'thad de /
translated: Others who are learned in thisüîΩsay that the refutation of going and coming is not established,üîΩand they point out the faults in the previous inferences, saying that ultimately the goer does not go because he possesses the action of going, like the sitter,

original: 'gro ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir lhas byin 'gro ba ma nyams pa bzhin no zhes rjes su dpag pa sngar bstan pa dag la skyon 'dogs par byed de /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir lhas byin 'gro ba ma nyams pa bzhin no zhes rjes su dpag pa sngar bstan pa dag la skyon 'dogs par byed de /
translated: and similarly, ultimately the goer does not rest because he possesses the action of going, like Devadatta who is not resting.

original: spyi'i don gang yin /
analyzed: spyi'i don gang yin /
translated: What is the general meaning of this?

original: bya ba dang ldan pas bya ba gzhan mi byed dam /
analyzed: bya ba dang ldan pas bya ba gzhan mi byed dam /
translated: Does it mean that one who possesses an action does not perform another action?

original: 'on te bya ba gang dang ldan pa de mi byed pa yin /
analyzed: 'on te bya ba gang dang ldan pa de mi byed pa yin /
translated: Or does it mean that one who possesses an action does not perform that action?

original: de la gal te brtag pa snga ma ltar 'dod na ni dpe med de /
analyzed: de la gal te brtag pa snga ma ltar 'dod na ni dpe med de /
translated: If the former, then there is no example.

original: de las gzhan pa'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i bya ba byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it performs an action other than that.

original: 'on te brtag pa phyi ma ltar 'dod na ni /
analyzed: 'on te brtag pa phyi ma ltar 'dod na ni /
translated: But if you assert the latter alternative,

original: de lta na yang don 'gal ba nyid yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang don 'gal ba nyid yin te /
translated: then it is contradictory because

original: smra ba po tshig smra bar byed cing /
analyzed: smra ba po tshig smra bar byed cing /
translated: the speaker speaks the words,

original: gcod pa po shing gcod par byed pa dang / de dang ldan pa nyid kyis de byed pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: gcod pa po shing gcod par byed pa dang / de dang ldan pa nyid kyis de byed pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: the cutter cuts the wood, and because the one possessing that action performs that action.

original: de la 'dir dpe med pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de la 'dir dpe med pa ma yin te /
translated: In this regard, it is not the case that there is no example.

original: de las gzhan pa'i bya ba'i byed pa po 'gro ba'i byed pa po nyid du ma grub pa sdod pa po la sogs pa dpe nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i skyon ldog pa med do //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa'i bya ba'i byed pa po 'gro ba'i byed pa po nyid du ma grub pa sdod pa po la sogs pa dpe nyid du 'dod pa'i phyir ji skad bshad pa'i skyon ldog pa med do //
translated: Because the one who performs an action other than that, the one who does not establish the action of going as the goer, is asserted as an example, such as the one who rests, and so on, the previously explained fault is not averted.

original: don 'gal ba nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: don 'gal ba nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: Nor is it contradictory because

original: 'di ltar / 'gro ba gang gis 'gro bor mngon //üîΩ'gro ba des ni de 'gro min //
analyzed: 'di ltar / 'gro ba gang gis 'gro bor mngon // 'gro ba des ni de 'gro min //
translated: the goer is manifest by the action of going.üîΩThe goer does not go by that action of going.

original: 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba po //
analyzed: 'gro ba gang gis 'gro ba po //
translated: The goer does not go by another action of going.

original: zhes bya bar mngon pa'i 'gro ba po de ni 'gro ba po de 'gro bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya bar mngon pa'i 'gro ba po de ni 'gro ba po de 'gro bar byed pa ma yin no zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning of the passage is that the goer who is manifest as such does not make the goer go.

original: don dam par gzhan pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
analyzed: don dam par gzhan pa nyid ma yin pa'i phyir /
