translated: Because it is not different in the ultimate sense,

original: rang gi bdag nyid bzhin pas rang gi rjes su dpag pa la gnod do //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid bzhin pas rang gi rjes su dpag pa la gnod do //
translated: it is like its own self, and thus it undermines your own inference.

original: gzhan pa nyid ma yin par smra ba rnams la grags pa'i gnod par yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: gzhan pa nyid ma yin par smra ba rnams la grags pa'i gnod par yang 'gyur te /
translated: It also undermines what is accepted by those who maintain that the goer and going are not different.

original: gang zhig gang du 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gang zhig gang du 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: Where would the goer go?

original: rang gi bdag nyid las tha dad par gyur pa'o zhes 'jig rten la grags pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid las tha dad par gyur pa'o zhes 'jig rten la grags pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is accepted in the world that the goer is different from himself.üîΩOr,

original: yang na / 'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon //
analyzed: yang na / 'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon //
translated: By what going is the goer manifest?

original: 'gro ba de ni de 'gro min //
analyzed: 'gro ba de ni de 'gro min //
translated: That going is not the going of that goer.

original: ji lta zhe na /
analyzed: ji lta zhe na /
translated: How is that?

original: gang phyir 'gro ba'i snga rol med //üîΩ'gro ba'i snga rol ni 'gro ba'i sngon rol na ste /üîΩ'gro ba skye ba'i snga rol na //
analyzed: gang phyir 'gro ba'i snga rol med // 'gro ba'i snga rol ni 'gro ba'i sngon rol na ste / 'gro ba skye ba'i snga rol na //
translated: Because there is no goer prior to going.üîΩPrior to going means before going.

original: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The meaning is that prior to the arising of going.

original: 'gro ba po gang rung gi bdag nyid kyis gnas pa 'gro ba'i rgyur gyur pa'am 'gro bar byed cing 'gro bo zhes bya ba'i tha snyad gdags pa la brten par 'gyur ba 'ga' yang med do //
analyzed: 'gro ba po gang rung gi bdag nyid kyis gnas pa 'gro ba'i rgyur gyur pa'am 'gro bar byed cing 'gro bo zhes bya ba'i tha snyad gdags pa la brten par 'gyur ba 'ga' yang med do //
translated: There is no going whatsoever that is the cause of the goer‚Äôs abiding, nor is there any goer who is based on going and is designated by the convention ‚Äúgoer.‚Äù

original: 'di ltar tha snyad du ni 'dun pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i rtsol bas bskyed pa'i rlung gi khams kyi dbang gis 'du byed kyi tshogs yul gzhan du dus tha dad pa med par skye ba byung ba ni 'gro ba po @73b yin la /
analyzed: 'di ltar tha snyad du ni 'dun pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i rtsol bas bskyed pa'i rlung gi khams kyi dbang gis 'du byed kyi tshogs yul gzhan du dus tha dad pa med par skye ba byung ba ni 'gro ba po @73b yin la /
translated: In this way, conventionally, the collection of formations that arises due to the power of the wind element generated by the exertion that arises from the cause of aspiration is the goer.

original: de skad cig snga ma las mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni 'gro ba yin no //
analyzed: de skad cig snga ma las mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba 'byung ba gang yin pa de ni 'gro ba yin no //
translated: The arising of something that has a different characteristic from the previous moment is going.

original: yang dag par ni rgyu la byed pa po'i tha snyed 'dogs pa las de byed pa po nyid du yang mi 'dod de /
analyzed: yang dag par ni rgyu la byed pa po'i tha snyed 'dogs pa las de byed pa po nyid du yang mi 'dod de /
translated: In reality, we do not assert that the cause is the goer because it is designated as the agent.

original: 'di ltar / gang zhig gang du 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: 'di ltar / gang zhig gang du 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: As it is said: What goes where?

original: rang gi bdag nyid la ma yin te /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la ma yin te /
translated: It does not go to its own nature.

original: rang gi bdag nyid la byed pa nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la byed pa nyid mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is untenable that it would act upon itself.

original: de ltar re zhig rang gi sde pa dag la /
analyzed: de ltar re zhig rang gi sde pa dag la /
translated: Thus, first, in regard to our own schools,üîΩit is said:

original: 'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon //
analyzed: 'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon //
translated: By what going is a goer manifested?

original: 'gro ba de ni de 'gro min //üîΩzhes bya ba yin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba de ni de 'gro min // zhes bya ba yin no //
translated: That going is not the going of that one.

original: grangs can gyi phyogs la yang sa la sogs pa lus kyi rnam par gnas pa'i khyad par can dag la rdul shas che bar gyur pa ni 'gro ba yin la /
analyzed: grangs can gyi phyogs la yang sa la sogs pa lus kyi rnam par gnas pa'i khyad par can dag la rdul shas che bar gyur pa ni 'gro ba yin la /
translated: In regard to the SƒÅ·πÉkhya position, the earth and so on that are distinguished by the body‚Äôs specific shape are the goer.

original: de dang ldan zhing de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa bya ba byed pa'i gnas kyi tshogs ni 'gro ba po yin no zhe na /
analyzed: de dang ldan zhing de'i bdag nyid du gyur pa bya ba byed pa'i gnas kyi tshogs ni 'gro ba po yin no zhe na /
translated: The collection of the parts that are the basis of action, which possesses that and is of the nature of that, is the goer.üîΩBut that is also not tenable, because

original: de yang / gang phyir 'gro ba'i snga rol med //
analyzed: de yang / gang phyir 'gro ba'i snga rol med //
translated: prior to going, it does not exist.

original: 'gro ba'i snga rol na de'i bdag nyid med pa yin te /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i snga rol na de'i bdag nyid med pa yin te /
translated: Prior to going, it does not exist as the nature of that.

original: sdod pa na yang 'gro'o zhes bya bar thal bar gyur na mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: sdod pa na yang 'gro'o zhes bya bar thal bar gyur na mi rung ba'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it would be untenable to say that it goes when it is at rest.

original: gang gi tshe 'gro ba snang bar gyur pa de'i tshe na de'i rgyu yin par yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: gang gi tshe 'gro ba snang bar gyur pa de'i tshe na de'i rgyu yin par yang mi rung ste /
translated: When going is manifest, it is not tenable that it is the cause of that.

original: gang zhig gang du 'gro bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gang zhig gang du 'gro bar 'gyur //
translated: How could it go somewhere?

original: de nyid kyis de mi byed do //
analyzed: de nyid kyis de mi byed do //
translated: It does not make itself go.

original: zhes bya bar dgongs so //üîΩgang la skye ba'i khyad par skyed par byed pa la myu gu skye'o //
analyzed: zhes bya bar dgongs so // gang la skye ba'i khyad par skyed par byed pa la myu gu skye'o //
translated: This is the intended meaning.

original: bdag nyid mkhas par byed do zhes brjod pa de yang rtog pas sgro btags pa ste /
analyzed: bdag nyid mkhas par byed do zhes brjod pa de yang rtog pas sgro btags pa ste /
translated: When it is said that a sprout arises from a seed, or that a person becomes a scholar, this is a conceptual superimposition,

original: ma skyes pa la bya ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro //üîΩji ltar 'gro ba'i bdag nyid du gyur pa 'gro ba mi 'thad pa de bzhin du smra ba po tshig smra bar byed cing /
analyzed: ma skyes pa la bya ba mi srid pa'i phyir ro // ji ltar 'gro ba'i bdag nyid du gyur pa 'gro ba mi 'thad pa de bzhin du smra ba po tshig smra bar byed cing /
translated: because an action is not possible in what has not arisen.üîΩJust as it is untenable that that which has the nature of going goes, so too it is untenable that the speaker speaks,

original: gcod pa po shing gcod par byed pa zhes bya ba de la yang rang gi bdag nyid la bya ba byed par mi 'thad de /
analyzed: gcod pa po shing gcod par byed pa zhes bya ba de la yang rang gi bdag nyid la bya ba byed par mi 'thad de /
translated: and the cutter cuts the wood.

original: gang gi phyir 'dir yang 'dun pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i rtsol bas bskyed pa'i gnas dang byung ba'i rgyu las ngag gi 'du byed kyi tshogs yi ge dang ngag dang tshig ces bya ba smra ba po las rang bzhin tha mi dad pa skad cig snga ma las
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'dir yang 'dun pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i rtsol bas bskyed pa'i gnas dang byung ba'i rgyu las ngag gi 'du byed kyi tshogs yi ge dang ngag dang tshig ces bya ba smra ba po las rang bzhin tha mi dad pa skad cig snga ma las
translated: Because here too, the collection of verbal formations called letters, speech, and words, which are produced from the cause of aspiration and generated by effort, are not essentially different from the speaker.

original: mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba khyad par gang gis smra ba po zhes brjod pa 'byung zhing /
analyzed: mtshan nyid mi 'dra ba khyad par gang gis smra ba po zhes brjod pa 'byung zhing /
translated: By what specific attribute, which is different from the previous moment, do they arise as the speaker?

original: de'i rgyu ni smra ba po yin pas smra ba po tshig smra bar byed do zhe na /
analyzed: de'i rgyu ni smra ba po yin pas smra ba po tshig smra bar byed do zhe na /
translated: And since the cause of that is the speaker, the speaker speaks the words.

original: de yang mi rung ste /
analyzed: de yang mi rung ste /
translated: That also is not correct.

original: gang phyir smra ba'i snga rol med /
analyzed: gang phyir smra ba'i snga rol med /
translated: Because prior to speaking, there is no speaker.

original: gang zhig ci zhig smra bar 'gyur //
analyzed: gang zhig ci zhig smra bar 'gyur //
translated: What is it that will speak?

original: des gcod pa po shing gcod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i lan kyang btab pa yin no //
analyzed: des gcod pa po shing gcod par byed pa zhes bya ba'i lan kyang btab pa yin no //
translated: This also replies to the question, ‚ÄúWho is the cutter? The one who cuts.‚Äù

original: de'i phyir de ltar dpe yang dngos bzhin du ma grub pas don 'gal ba nyid kyi skyon gyi gnas med par mi 'gyur bar rigs so //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar dpe yang dngos bzhin du ma grub pas don 'gal ba nyid kyi skyon gyi gnas med par mi 'gyur bar rigs so //
translated: Therefore, since the example is not established like the object, it is reasonable that the fault of contradiction does not apply.

original: gzhan dag ni /
analyzed: gzhan dag ni /
translated: Others say:

original: gang phyir 'gro ba'i sngon rol med //üîΩces bya ba de la 'gro @74a * //
analyzed: gang phyir 'gro ba'i sngon rol med // ces bya ba de la 'gro @74a * //
translated: Because there is no going prior to the goer.

original: ba skye ba'i snga rol na 'gro ba po 'gro ba dang bral ba ni 'gro ba po nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i tha snyad mi srid pas 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhes bya bar mi rigs so zhes zer ro //üîΩde ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: ba skye ba'i snga rol na 'gro ba po 'gro ba dang bral ba ni 'gro ba po nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhes bya ba'i tha snyad mi srid pas 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhes bya bar mi rigs so zhes zer ro // de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: In that case, prior to the arising of going, the goer would be devoid of going. Because it is untenable that the goer is a goer, the convention ‚Äúthe goer goes‚Äù is impossible. Therefore it is illogical to say ‚Äúthe goer goes.‚Äù

original: 'gro ba po mi 'gro'o zhes bya ba des don bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba po mi 'gro'o zhes bya ba des don bstan zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: That is illogical because the meaning of ‚Äúthe goer does not go‚Äù has already been explained.

original: bye brag pa dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: bye brag pa dag gis smras pa /
translated: The Vai≈õe·π£ikas say:

original: 'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon //
analyzed: 'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon //
translated: The goer is known through going.

original: 'gro ba de ni de 'gre min //üîΩzhes bya ba ni bden mod kyi /
analyzed: 'gro ba de ni de 'gre min // zhes bya ba ni bden mod kyi /
translated: That going is not the going of that goer.

original: 'on kyang de las de gzhan pa nyid yin pas kho bo cag la ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pa'i gnod pas gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'on kyang de las de gzhan pa nyid yin pas kho bo cag la ji skad bshad pa'i rnam pa'i gnod pas gnod par mi 'gyur ro //
translated: That is true, but because it is different from that, we are not undermined by the faults explained earlier.

original: kho bo cag ni rdzas kyi blo dang / las kyi blo gzhan pa nyid du grub ste /
analyzed: kho bo cag ni rdzas kyi blo dang / las kyi blo gzhan pa nyid du grub ste /
translated: We assert that the cognition of substance and the cognition of action are different.

original: yul tha dad pa'i phyir dper na ba lang gi blo dang ba men gyi blo gzhan pa nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: yul tha dad pa'i phyir dper na ba lang gi blo dang ba men gyi blo gzhan pa nyid bzhin no //
translated: Because the objects are different, like the cognition of an ox and the cognition of a horse.

original: gang gzhan pa nyid ma yin pa de la ni yul tha dad pa med de /
analyzed: gang gzhan pa nyid ma yin pa de la ni yul tha dad pa med de /
translated: That which is not different, there is no difference of object.

original: dper na ba lang gi blo rang las gzhan pa nyid ma yin pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na ba lang gi blo rang las gzhan pa nyid ma yin pa bzhin no //
translated: Like the cognition of an ox, which is not different from itself.

original: 'dir bshad pa /üîΩji ltar / 'gro ba gang gi 'gro por mngon //
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa / ji ltar / 'gro ba gang gi 'gro por mngon //
translated: Here we say:üîΩJust as it is said:

original: 'gro ba de ni de 'gro min //
analyzed: 'gro ba de ni de 'gro min //
translated: ‚ÄúThe goer is not manifest in that going in which he is manifest.‚ÄùüîΩBecause that is not tenable.

original: de mi rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de bzhin du /üîΩ'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon //
analyzed: de mi rigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba de bzhin du / 'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon //
translated: In the same way,

original: de las gzhan pa de 'gro min //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa de 'gro min //
translated: ‚ÄúThe goer is not manifest in that going which is other than he.‚Äù

original: de las gzhan pa nyid bkag pa'i phyir dang / de ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir dang / gang yang gang dang lhan cig gzhan pa nyid du mi 'thad par khas blangs pa'i phyir dang / dpe yang ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa nyid bkag pa'i phyir dang / de ston pa'i rjes su dpag pa med pa'i phyir dang / gang yang gang dang lhan cig gzhan pa nyid du mi 'thad par khas blangs pa'i phyir dang / dpe yang ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: Because otherness is refuted, because there is no inference to demonstrate it, because it is accepted that it is not tenable that anything is other than itself, and because the example is not established. This is the intended meaning.

original: yang na / 'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon //
analyzed: yang na / 'gro ba gang gis 'gro por mngon //
translated: Or,üîΩBy what going is the goer manifest?

original: de las gzhan pa de 'gro min //
analyzed: de las gzhan pa de 'gro min //
translated: That which is other than going is not a goer.

original: zhes bya ba ni //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni //
translated: This is the

original: dam bca' ba nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
analyzed: dam bca' ba nye bar gzhag pa yin no //
translated: statement of the thesis.

original: gal te ci'i phyir zhe na /üîΩgang phyir 'gro po gcig pu la //
analyzed: gal te ci'i phyir zhe na / gang phyir 'gro po gcig pu la //
translated: If it is asked, ‚ÄúWhy?‚ÄùüîΩBecause it is not tenable

original: 'gro ba gnyis su mi 'thad do //
analyzed: 'gro ba gnyis su mi 'thad do //
translated: That a single goer has two goings.

original: des ni 'gro ba po'i chos 'gro ba gnyis dang mi ldan pa nyid bstan to //üîΩ'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par rang las gzhan pa'i 'gro ba ni 'gro ba po 'gro bar byed pa ma yin te /
analyzed: des ni 'gro ba po'i chos 'gro ba gnyis dang mi ldan pa nyid bstan to // 'dir rjes su dpag pa ni don dam par rang las gzhan pa'i 'gro ba ni 'gro ba po 'gro bar byed pa ma yin te /
translated: This shows that the goer does not have two goings.

original: 'gro ba gnyis dang mi ldan pa'i phyir dper na sdod pa po bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba gnyis dang mi ldan pa'i phyir dper na sdod pa po bzhin no //
translated: Here the inference is: Ultimately, that which is other than the goer is not the goer who performs going, because it does not have two goings, like the nongoer.

original: gzhan dag na re /üîΩgang phyir 'gro po gcig bu la //
analyzed: gzhan dag na re / gang phyir 'gro po gcig bu la //
translated: Others say,üîΩBecause it is not tenable

original: 'gro ba gnyis su mi 'thad do //
analyzed: 'gro ba gnyis su mi 'thad do //
translated: That a single goer has two goings.

original: gang gi phyir 'gro pa po gcig pu la gang gi 'gro ba po zhes bya bar mngon pa dang / 'gro ba por gyur nas gang 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba gnyis mi 'thad pa de'i phyir de las gzhan pa'i 'gro ba yang 'gro ba po 'gro bar byed pa ma yin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gang gi phyir 'gro pa po gcig pu la gang gi 'gro ba po zhes bya bar mngon pa dang / 'gro ba por gyur nas gang 'gro bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba gnyis mi 'thad pa de'i phyir de las gzhan pa'i 'gro ba yang 'gro ba po 'gro bar byed pa ma yin no zhes zer ro //
translated: Because it is untenable that a single goer has two goings, one called ‚Äúgoer‚Äù and one called ‚Äúgoing,‚Äù therefore another going is not the goer‚Äôs going.

original: kha cig na re /
analyzed: kha cig na re /
translated: Some say:

original: de @74b ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de @74b ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is not correct,

original: 'gro ba'i rgyu gcig kho na yod par khas blangs pas de dang ldan pa'i phyir 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhes bya bar 'grub pa'i phyir dang / gzhan pa nyid ma bkag pa'i phyir dang / re zhig 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhes //
analyzed: 'gro ba'i rgyu gcig kho na yod par khas blangs pas de dang ldan pa'i phyir 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhes bya bar 'grub pa'i phyir dang / gzhan pa nyid ma bkag pa'i phyir dang / re zhig 'gro ba po 'gro'o zhes //
translated: because it is established that the goer goes because it is accepted that the cause of going exists as one, and because it is not refuted that the goer is different from going, and because it is not established that the goer goes.

original: ji ltar 'thad pa nyid du 'gyur //
analyzed: ji ltar 'thad pa nyid du 'gyur //
translated: How could it be tenable to sayüîΩ‚ÄúThe goer goes‚Äù?

original: zhes bya ba de dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba de dang khyad par med pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
translated: Because it is not different from that.

original: gzegs zan pa dag gis smras pa /
analyzed: gzegs zan pa dag gis smras pa /
translated: The followers of Kanada say:

original: 'gro ba ni gcig kho na ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba ni gcig kho na ste /
translated: There is only one going.

original: de ni 'gro ba po las gzhan pa nyid yin la /
analyzed: de ni 'gro ba po las gzhan pa nyid yin la /
translated: It is different from the goer.

original: de dang ldan pa'i phyir 'gro ba po la 'gro ba po zhes tha snyad gdags su rung ngo //
analyzed: de dang ldan pa'i phyir 'gro ba po la 'gro ba po zhes tha snyad gdags su rung ngo //
translated: Because it possesses that, it is suitable to designate the goer as the goer.

original: 'gro ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir de byed pa na 'gro'o zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir de byed pa na 'gro'o zhes bya ba ste /
translated: Because it is the cause of going, when it is acting, it is going.

original: dper na mar me snang ba'i rgyu yin pas snang bar byed do zhes bya ba bzhin pas /
analyzed: dper na mar me snang ba'i rgyu yin pas snang bar byed do zhes bya ba bzhin pas /
translated: For example, because a lamp is the cause of illumination, it is said to illuminate.

original: gang phyir 'gro po gcig pu la //
analyzed: gang phyir 'gro po gcig pu la //
translated: Therefore, the statement, ‚ÄúBecause it is not tenable that a single goer

original: 'gro ba gnyis su mi 'thad do //üîΩzhes bya ba de rigs pa ma yin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba gnyis su mi 'thad do // zhes bya ba de rigs pa ma yin no //
translated: has two goings,‚Äù is not reasonable.

original: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni bzang po ma yin te /
translated: That is not good,

original: gtan tshigs ji skad smos pa bsgrub pa'i phyir dang / don dam par 'gro ba bkag pa'i phyir dang / med pa las skye ba bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gtan tshigs ji skad smos pa bsgrub pa'i phyir dang / don dam par 'gro ba bkag pa'i phyir dang / med pa las skye ba bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the reason is stated to prove that, because going is refuted ultimately, and because arising from nonexistence is refuted.

original: yang na 'gro ba po ni 'gro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyu ma yin par shes te /
analyzed: yang na 'gro ba po ni 'gro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyu ma yin par shes te /
translated: Or else, it is understood that the goer is not the cause of possessing going,

original: blo dang sgras khyad par can 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dper na las bzhin pas rjes su dpag pa'i gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: blo dang sgras khyad par can 'jug pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dper na las bzhin pas rjes su dpag pa'i gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the cause of engaging with a qualifier, like the cognition and word, for example, because it is harmed by inference.

original: 'gro ba po ni de dang ldan pa don med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba po ni de dang ldan pa don med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it is meaningless for the goer to possess going.

original: 'gro ba po ma yin pa yang 'gro ba po ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir sdod pa po bzhin du de dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: 'gro ba po ma yin pa yang 'gro ba po ma yin pa nyid kyi phyir sdod pa po bzhin du de dang mi ldan pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because the nongoer does not possess going, just like the sitter, because he is not a goer.

original: 'dir rjes su dpag pa dri ba'am smra bar rigs te /
analyzed: 'dir rjes su dpag pa dri ba'am smra bar rigs te /
translated: Here it is appropriate to ask for a syllogistic reason or to state one.

original: smra ba thams cad ni rang gi gzhung smra ba la dpa' ba yin pas tshig la ni zad pa med do //
analyzed: smra ba thams cad ni rang gi gzhung smra ba la dpa' ba yin pas tshig la ni zad pa med do //
translated: Since all debaters are brave in stating their own position, there is no end to words.

original: de'i phyir de ltar rigs pas dpyad na /üîΩ'gro po min par gyur pa ni //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar rigs pas dpyad na / 'gro po min par gyur pa ni //
translated: Therefore, when analyzed in this way through reasoning,üîΩThe goer does not

original: 'gro rnam gsum du 'gro mi byed //
analyzed: 'gro rnam gsum du 'gro mi byed //
translated: Make going in any of the three ways.

original: de ma yin par gyur pa yang //
analyzed: de ma yin par gyur pa yang //
translated: The nongoer also

original: 'gro rnam gsum du 'gro mi byed //
analyzed: 'gro rnam gsum du 'gro mi byed //
translated: Does not make going in any of the three ways.

original: yin dang ma yin gyur pa yang //
analyzed: yin dang ma yin gyur pa yang //
translated: One who is both the goer and the nongoer

original: 'gro rnam gsum du 'gro mi byed //üîΩ'gro po yin par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba po gang 'gro ba dang ldan pa ste /
analyzed: 'gro rnam gsum du 'gro mi byed // 'gro po yin par gyur pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba po gang 'gro ba dang ldan pa ste /
translated: Also does not make going in any of the three ways.üîΩThe goer who is called ‚Äúthe goer‚Äù is the one who possesses going.

original: 'gro ba yod pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: 'gro ba yod pa zhes bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: This means that he is the one who has going.

original: 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni 'grong bar bya ba'o //
analyzed: 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni 'grong bar bya ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúHe goes‚Äù means he is one who goes.

original: rnam gsum du zhes bya ba ni song ba dang / ma song ba dang / bgom par ro //
analyzed: rnam gsum du zhes bya ba ni song ba dang / ma song ba dang / bgom par ro //
translated: ‚ÄúIn the three ways‚Äù means in the already gone, the not yet gone, and that being gone over.

original: de ma yin par gyur pa yang zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba po gang 'gro ba dang bral ba'o //
analyzed: de ma yin par gyur pa yang zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba po gang 'gro ba dang bral ba'o //
translated: ‚ÄúNor does he who is not a goer‚Äù means the goer who is devoid of going.

original: yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa yang zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa yang zhes bya ba ni /
translated: ‚ÄúNor does he who is both a goer and not a goer‚Äù means

original: 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba dang ldan pa yang yin la /üîΩ'gro ba dang bral ba yang @75a * //
analyzed: 'gro ba po dang / 'gro ba dang ldan pa yang yin la / 'gro ba dang bral ba yang @75a * //
translated: he who is a goer and is also devoid of going.üîΩ‚ÄúNor does he who is neither a goer nor not a goer‚Äù meansüîΩhe who is neither a goer nor devoid of going.

original: yin pa'o // de la re zhig 'gro ba po yin par gyur pa ni 'gro ba rnam pa gsum du 'gro bar mi byed de /
analyzed: yin pa'o // de la re zhig 'gro ba po yin par gyur pa ni 'gro ba rnam pa gsum du 'gro bar mi byed de /
translated: First, one who is a goer does not perform going in the three ways.

original: bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir de las gzhan pa bzhin no //
analyzed: bya ba dang ldan pa'i phyir de las gzhan pa bzhin no //
translated: Because he possesses activity, like someone other than the goer.

original: de ma yin par gyur pa yang 'gro ba rnam pa gsum du 'gro bar mi byed de /
analyzed: de ma yin par gyur pa yang 'gro ba rnam pa gsum du 'gro bar mi byed de /
translated: Nor does he who is not a goer perform going in the three ways.

original: 'gro ba dang bral ba'i phyir sdod pa po bzhin no //
analyzed: 'gro ba dang bral ba'i phyir sdod pa po bzhin no //
translated: Because he is devoid of going, like someone who is not a goer.üîΩNor does he who is both a goer and not a goer perform going in the three ways.üîΩBecause he is both a goer and not a goer.üîΩNor does he who is neither a goer nor not a goer perform going in the three ways.

original: yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa yang 'gro ba rnam pa gsum du 'gro bar mi byed de /
analyzed: yin pa dang ma yin par gyur pa yang 'gro ba rnam pa gsum du 'gro bar mi byed de /
translated: Because he is neither a goer nor not a goer.

original: phyogs gnyi gar bstan pa'i rjes su dpag pa dag gis gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs gnyi gar bstan pa'i rjes su dpag pa dag gis gnod par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is undermined by the inferences that are taught in both systems.

original: de bzhin du 'gro ba phyogs su byas pa la yang gtan tshigs dang dpe'i sbyor ba ci rigs par bya'o //
analyzed: de bzhin du 'gro ba phyogs su byas pa la yang gtan tshigs dang dpe'i sbyor ba ci rigs par bya'o //
translated: In the same way, the application of the reason and example should be appropriately formulated in regard to the going that is posited as the path.

original: de'i phyir de ltar rigs pa dang lung dag gis rnam pa thams cad du yongs su brtags na /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar rigs pa dang lung dag gis rnam pa thams cad du yongs su brtags na /
translated: Thus, when one examines in every way by means of reasoning and scripture,

original: 'gro ba la sogs pa rnam pa gsum po dag ji ltar yang mi srid pa /
analyzed: 'gro ba la sogs pa rnam pa gsum po dag ji ltar yang mi srid pa /
translated: the three kinds of going, etc., are in no way possible.üîΩTherefore, there is no going, goer,

original: de phyir 'gro dang 'gro po dang // bgrod par bya ba'ang yod ma yin //
analyzed: de phyir 'gro dang 'gro po dang // bgrod par bya ba'ang yod ma yin //
translated: or anything to go.

original: zhes bya ba ni 'bad pa'i 'bras bu ji skad bstan pa'i dbang gis mjug bsdu ba'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba ni 'bad pa'i 'bras bu ji skad bstan pa'i dbang gis mjug bsdu ba'o //
translated: This is the conclusion that is taught by the force of the result of effort as it has been explained.

original: slob dpon gyis bya ba dang byed pa po lhag ma dgag pa yang phyogs 'dis bstan to //
analyzed: slob dpon gyis bya ba dang byed pa po lhag ma dgag pa yang phyogs 'dis bstan to //
translated: The master also teaches the refutation of the remaining actions and agents by this method.

original: de la 'dir rab tu byed pa'i don ni 'gro ba ngo bo nyid med pa nyid bstan pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de la 'dir rab tu byed pa'i don ni 'gro ba ngo bo nyid med pa nyid bstan pas rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa bstan pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of this chapter is to teach that dependent origination is devoid of coming and going, since it teaches that beings are devoid of intrinsic reality.üîΩTherefore, that which has no coming and no going is the going of the noble ones.üîΩAnd, Son of noble lineage! The TathƒÅgata has no coming or going.

original: de'i phyir gang la 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'o zhes bya ba dang / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro med do zhes bya ba dang / 'di la 'ong dang 'gro ba gang yang med //
analyzed: de'i phyir gang la 'gro ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa de ni 'phags pa rnams kyi 'gro ba'o zhes bya ba dang / rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa la ni 'ong ba'am 'gro med do zhes bya ba dang / 'di la 'ong dang 'gro ba gang yang med //
translated: And, Here there is no coming or going at all.

original: chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' ji bzhin no //üîΩzhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du gang la 'gro bar bya ba'am /
analyzed: chos rnams thams cad nam mkha' ji bzhin no // zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin du gang la 'gro bar bya ba'am /
translated: All phenomena are like space.

original: 'ong bar bya ba rdul phran tsam yang med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
analyzed: 'ong bar bya ba rdul phran tsam yang med pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste /
translated: And, Similarly, that which has not even an atom‚Äôs worth of coming or going is the perfection of wisdom of the bodhisattvas.

original: de la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba mi snang ngo //
analyzed: de la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba mi snang ngo //
translated: In it, coming and going are not apparent.

original: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa gzugs la 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba mi snang ngo //
analyzed: rab kyi rtsal gyis rnam par gnon pa gzugs la 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba mi snang ngo //
translated: Subh≈´ti, coming and going are not evident in form.

original: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba mi snang ngo /
analyzed: tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba mi snang ngo /
translated: Coming and going are not evident in feeling, perception, volitional factors, or consciousness.

original: gang gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba mi snang ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de dag grub pa yin no //
analyzed: gang gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba mi snang ba de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa de dag grub pa yin no //
translated: That non-appearance of the coming and going of form, feeling, perception, volitional factors, and consciousness is the perfection of wisdom.

original: slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis nye bar sbyar ba /
analyzed: slob dpon legs ldan byed kyis nye bar sbyar ba /
translated: This is established by the master BhƒÅviveka.

original: dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron @75b ma las /
analyzed: dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron @75b ma las /
translated: In the commentary on the root text of the middle way called the lamp of wisdom

original: song ba dang / ma song ba dang / bsgom pa brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /
analyzed: song ba dang / ma song ba dang / bsgom pa brtag pa zhes bya ba ste /
translated: The analysis of going, not going, and that being gone over is called

original: rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o /
analyzed: rab tu byed pa gnyis pa'o /
translated: The second chapter.

original: // / dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma /üîΩbam po bzhi pa /
analyzed: // / dbu ma'i rtsa ba'i 'grel pa shes rab sgron ma /üîΩbam po bzhi pa /
translated: In the commentary on the root text of the middle way called the lamp of wisdom

original: de la da ni skye ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pas skye mched rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa'i don gyi dbang gis rab tu byed pa gsum pa brtsam mo //
analyzed: de la da ni skye ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi khyad par dgag pas skye mched rnams ngo bo nyid med pa nyid du bstan pa'i don gyi dbang gis rab tu byed pa gsum pa brtsam mo //
translated: Now, in order to demonstrate the essencelessness of the sense-spheres by refuting the distinctions of the discordant side of arising, the third chapter is begun.

original: yang na 'gro ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs dgag pas skye mched rnams stong pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir rab tu byed pa gsum pa brtsam mo //
analyzed: yang na 'gro ba mi mthun pa'i phyogs dgag pas skye mched rnams stong pa nyid du bstan pa'i phyir rab tu byed pa gsum pa brtsam mo //
translated: Or, in order to demonstrate the emptiness of the sense-spheres by refuting the discordant side of the world, the third chapter is begun.

original: gang gi tshe dang po ltar na brtag pa de'i tshe mi mthun pa'i phyogs nye bar bzhag pa ni /
analyzed: gang gi tshe dang po ltar na brtag pa de'i tshe mi mthun pa'i phyogs nye bar bzhag pa ni /
translated: When it is the first case, the positing of the discordant side is as follows.

original: don dam par nang gi skye mched rnams skye ba kho nar gzung bar bya ste /
analyzed: don dam par nang gi skye mched rnams skye ba kho nar gzung bar bya ste /
translated: The inner sense-spheres should be taken as only arising ultimately,

original: yul so sor nges pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul so sor nges pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because of the determination of the object.

original: 'di na gang skye ba med pa de la ni yul so sor nges pa med de /
analyzed: 'di na gang skye ba med pa de la ni yul so sor nges pa med de /
translated: Here, that which does not arise does not have a determination of the object,

original: dper na mo gsham gyi bu'i skye mched rnams la yul so sor nges pa med pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na mo gsham gyi bu'i skye mched rnams la yul so sor nges pa med pa bzhin no //
translated: just as, for example, the sense-spheres of the son of a barren woman do not have a determination of the object.

original: nang gi skye mched rnams la ni yul so sor nges pa 'di lta bu yod de /
analyzed: nang gi skye mched rnams la ni yul so sor nges pa 'di lta bu yod de /
translated: The internal sense bases have such and such specific objects.üîΩ

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /
translated: The internal sense-spheres are determined in regard to their objects in the following way:

original: lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / snom pa dang / myong bar byed pa dang / reg par byed pa dang / yid rnams kyi yul gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang // reg bya dang / chos rnams yin par go rims bzhin no //
analyzed: lta ba dang / nyan pa dang / snom pa dang / myong bar byed pa dang / reg par byed pa dang / yid rnams kyi yul gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang // reg bya dang / chos rnams yin par go rims bzhin no //
translated: The objects of the eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mental faculty are, respectively, form, sound, smell, taste, tangible objects, and entities.

original: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ji skad smos pas nang gi skye mched rnams skye ba kho nar gzung bar bya'o //
analyzed: de'i phyir gtan tshigs ji skad smos pas nang gi skye mched rnams skye ba kho nar gzung bar bya'o //
translated: Therefore, the internal sense-spheres should be understood as only that which is produced, for the reasons stated.

original: gang gi tshe gnyis pa ltar brtag pa de'i tshe ni /
analyzed: gang gi tshe gnyis pa ltar brtag pa de'i tshe ni /
translated: If you imagine that the second alternative is correct,üîΩthen it follows that the goer, the nongoer, and going

original: de phyir 'gro dang 'gro po dang // bgrod par bya ba'ang yod ma yin //üîΩzhes bshad pa'i phyir /
analyzed: de phyir 'gro dang 'gro po dang // bgrod par bya ba'ang yod ma yin // zhes bshad pa'i phyir /
translated: do not exist.

original: pha rol po dag na re /üîΩ'gro ba yod pa nyid du shes par bya ste /
analyzed: pha rol po dag na re / 'gro ba yod pa nyid du shes par bya ste /
translated: The opponent might argue as follows:

original: bya ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bya ba'i 'bras bu yin pa'i phyir //
translated: Going exists because it is the effect of the act of going,

original: gzugs la lta ba la sogs pa bzhin no zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzugs la lta ba la sogs pa bzhin no zhes zer ro //
translated: just as seeing is the effect of the eye.

original: phyogs gnyi ga'i lan du bshad pa /
analyzed: phyogs gnyi ga'i lan du bshad pa /
translated: The reply to both positions

original: lta dang nyan dang snom pa dang // myong bar byed dang reg byed yid //
analyzed: lta dang nyan dang snom pa dang // myong bar byed dang reg byed yid //
translated: The eye, ear, nose, tongue, body, and mindüîΩare the six sense faculties.

original: dbang po drug po de dag gi / spyod yul blta bar bya la sogs //
analyzed: dbang po drug po de dag gi / spyod yul blta bar bya la sogs //
translated: Their objects are the visible forms, etc.

original: lta zhes bya ba ni lta bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: lta zhes bya ba ni lta bar byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The eye is so called because it sees.

original: lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin no //
analyzed: lhag ma rnams la yang de bzhin no //
translated: The same for the others.

original: dbang po zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa gzung ba'i phyir tshogs de la dbang po dang / bdag po nyid byed pa'i phyir ro //üîΩdrug po zhes bya ba ni so so'i ming smos pa nyid kyis grangs kyang rab tu grub mod kyi /üîΩde nges par gsung ba ni tha snyad du yang de dag las gzhan pa'i gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs par byed pa'i byed pa po med par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro //üîΩde dag gi zhes bya ba ni dbang po @76a * //
analyzed: dbang po zhes bya ba ni gzugs la sogs pa gzung ba'i phyir tshogs de la dbang po dang / bdag po nyid byed pa'i phyir ro // drug po zhes bya ba ni so so'i ming smos pa nyid kyis grangs kyang rab tu grub mod kyi / de nges par gsung ba ni tha snyad du yang de dag las gzhan pa'i gzugs la sogs pa la dmigs par byed pa'i byed pa po med par shes par bya ba'i phyir ro // de dag gi zhes bya ba ni dbang po @76a * //
translated: The sense faculty is so called because it has the power to grasp visible forms, etc.

original: drug po de dag gi'o //
