original: spyod yul zhes bya ba ni yul te de dag la mthun yod pa nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
analyzed: spyod yul zhes bya ba ni yul te de dag la mthun yod pa nyid ces bya ba'i tha tshig go //
translated: The term ‚Äúfield‚Äù means an object, and the term ‚Äúexists‚Äù means that they are present.

original: blta bar bya ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni blta bar bya ba dang / mnyan par bya ba dang / bsnam par bya ba dang / myang bar bya ba dang / reg par bya ba dang / bsam par bya ba dag go //
analyzed: blta bar bya ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni blta bar bya ba dang / mnyan par bya ba dang / bsnam par bya ba dang / myang bar bya ba dang / reg par bya ba dang / bsam par bya ba dag go //
translated: The term ‚Äúvisible form‚Äù and so on refers to visible form, sound, odor, taste, tangible objects, and mental objects.

original: yul can dang / yul so sor nges pa de yang tha snyad pa yin gyi don dam pa ni ma yin pas /
analyzed: yul can dang / yul so sor nges pa de yang tha snyad pa yin gyi don dam pa ni ma yin pas /
translated: The determination of the object and the subject is conventional, not ultimate.

original: gtan tshigs mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'ba' zhig la yod pas don 'gal ba nyid do //
analyzed: gtan tshigs mi mthun pa'i phyogs 'ba' zhig la yod pas don 'gal ba nyid do //
translated: Since the reason exists only in relation to the discordant side, it is contradictory.

original: don dam par ji ltar mig la sogs pa yul can dang / yul gyi dngos por mi 'thad pa de ltar 'di bshad par bya ste /
analyzed: don dam par ji ltar mig la sogs pa yul can dang / yul gyi dngos por mi 'thad pa de ltar 'di bshad par bya ste /
translated: The following is an explanation of how, ultimately, the existence of the eye and so on as the subject and object is untenable.

original: re zhig mig gi dbang po gcig bu'i dbang du mdzad nas /üîΩlta ba rang gi bdag nyid na //
analyzed: re zhig mig gi dbang po gcig bu'i dbang du mdzad nas / lta ba rang gi bdag nyid na //
translated: First, with respect to the eye faculty alone, it is said:üîΩThe eye does not see itself.

original: de ni de la mi lta nyid //
analyzed: de ni de la mi lta nyid //
translated: How could it see something else?

original: lta ba zhes bya ba ni lta bar byed pa'i phyir te /
analyzed: lta ba zhes bya ba ni lta bar byed pa'i phyir te /
translated: ‚ÄúSeeing‚Äù is so called because it sees.

original: mig gi dbang po zhes bya'o //üîΩrang gi bdag nyid na zhes bya ba ni /
analyzed: mig gi dbang po zhes bya'o // rang gi bdag nyid na zhes bya ba ni /
translated: It is called the eye faculty.üîΩ‚Äú Itself‚Äù means

original: rang gi ngo bo nyid yin na'o //
analyzed: rang gi ngo bo nyid yin na'o //
translated: by its own intrinsic reality.üîΩ‚Äú It does not see itself‚Äù means

original: de ni de la mi lta nyid //üîΩces bya ba la /
analyzed: de ni de la mi lta nyid // ces bya ba la /
translated: that it does not see itself.

original: ci'i phyir lta bar mi byed pa nyid yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir lta bar mi byed pa nyid yin zhe na /
translated: Why does it not see itself?

original: phyogs de ni tshig gi don 'og nas 'byung bas gsal bar byed do //
analyzed: phyogs de ni tshig gi don 'og nas 'byung bas gsal bar byed do //
translated: The meaning of this statement will be clarified later.

original: ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why?

original: de ni de la mi lta ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: de ni de la mi lta ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it does not see itself.

original: de ni grags pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: de ni grags pa yin no zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: This is well known.

original: nyid ces bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i don te /
analyzed: nyid ces bya ba'i sgra ni nges par gzung ba'i don te /
translated: The word ‚Äúitself‚Äù has the meaning of specification.

original: 'dir lta bar mi byed pa nyid ces bya bar blta bar bya'i gzhan du na gzhan la lta bar byed pa zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: 'dir lta bar mi byed pa nyid ces bya bar blta bar bya'i gzhan du na gzhan la lta bar byed pa zhes bya bar shes par 'gyur ro //
translated: Here, it should be understood that ‚Äúit does not see itself‚Äù is specified, otherwise it would be understood to mean that it sees something else.

original: ci ste de lta na khyod kyis ci zhig bsgrub par 'gyur te /
analyzed: ci ste de lta na khyod kyis ci zhig bsgrub par 'gyur te /
translated: But if that is so, what do you prove?

original: gang gi tshe mig rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed do zhes smras pa'i tshe /
analyzed: gang gi tshe mig rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed do zhes smras pa'i tshe /
translated: When you say the eye does not see its own nature,

original: gzhan du gyur pa gzugs la lta bar byed do zhes khas len to zhe na /
analyzed: gzhan du gyur pa gzugs la lta bar byed do zhes khas len to zhe na /
translated: you accept that it sees form, which is other.

original: khyed 'dod pa gang yin pa de yang /
analyzed: khyed 'dod pa gang yin pa de yang /
translated: But what you assert

original: gang tshe bdag la mi lta ba//
analyzed: gang tshe bdag la mi lta ba//
translated: is that when it does not see itself,

original: de gzhan dag la ji ltar lta //
analyzed: de gzhan dag la ji ltar lta //
translated: how could it see others?

original: mig gzugs la lta bar byed pa'i mthu nyid med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don te /
analyzed: mig gzugs la lta bar byed pa'i mthu nyid med do zhes bya ba'i tshig gi don te /
translated: The meaning of the words is that the eye itself does not have the power to see form.

original: de la 'dir tshig le'ur byas pa'i phyed gong mas ni mig rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa'i chos bstan la /
analyzed: de la 'dir tshig le'ur byas pa'i phyed gong mas ni mig rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa'i chos bstan la /
translated: Here, the first half of the verse teaches that the eye does not see its own nature.

original: phyed 'og mas ni bsgrub par bya ba chos gzugs la lta bar mi byed pa bstan to //
analyzed: phyed 'og mas ni bsgrub par bya ba chos gzugs la lta bar mi byed pa bstan to //
translated: The second half teaches that the probandum, form, is not seen.

original: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i chos nye bar gzhag pas sbyor ba'i tshig tu 'dod pa ni don dam par mig gi dbang po ni gzugs la lta bar mi byed pa nyid de /
analyzed: de'i phyir bsgrub par bya ba dang / sgrub pa'i chos nye bar gzhag pas sbyor ba'i tshig tu 'dod pa ni don dam par mig gi dbang po ni gzugs la lta bar mi byed pa nyid de /
translated: Therefore, the statement that the eye does not see form is a syllogism that posits the probandum and the logical argument.

original: rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa'i phyir /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa'i phyir /
translated: Because it does not see itself.

original: dper na rna ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: dper na rna ba la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: For example, like the ear and so on.

original: yang na phyed gong mas ni mig gi dbang po gzung ba nyid @76b ma yin par bstan nas /
analyzed: yang na phyed gong mas ni mig gi dbang po gzung ba nyid @76b ma yin par bstan nas /
translated: Or, the first half of the verse teaches that the eye sense faculty is not the apprehender,

original: mig gi dbang po rang gi bdag nyid chos mthun pa'i dpe nyid du nye bar bzhag la /
analyzed: mig gi dbang po rang gi bdag nyid chos mthun pa'i dpe nyid du nye bar bzhag la /
translated: and posits the eye sense faculty itself as a similar example,

original: phyed 'og mas ni mig gi dbang po gzugs la lta bar mi byed par bstan pas bsgrub par bya ba chos gzugs mig gi dbang po'i yul ma yin pa nyid bstan to //
analyzed: phyed 'og mas ni mig gi dbang po gzugs la lta bar mi byed par bstan pas bsgrub par bya ba chos gzugs mig gi dbang po'i yul ma yin pa nyid bstan to //
translated: while the second half of the verse teaches that the eye sense faculty does not see form, thus teaching that form, the property to be established, is not the object of the eye sense faculty.

original: 'dir de'i dbang gis sbyor ba'i tshig ni don dam par gzugs mig gi dbang po'i yul ma yin te /
analyzed: 'dir de'i dbang gis sbyor ba'i tshig ni don dam par gzugs mig gi dbang po'i yul ma yin te /
translated: Here, the statement of the syllogism by the power of that is: Ultimately, form is not the object of the eye sense faculty,

original: bsags pa'i phyir dper na mig gi dbang po'i bdag nyid bzhin no //
analyzed: bsags pa'i phyir dper na mig gi dbang po'i bdag nyid bzhin no //
translated: because it is an aggregation, for example, like the nature of the eye sense faculty itself.

original: rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byad pa dang / bsags pa ni mtshan nyid kyi sgra'i tshul nye bar gzung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byad pa dang / bsags pa ni mtshan nyid kyi sgra'i tshul nye bar gzung ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it does not see itself and because the term ‚Äúaggregation‚Äù is taken in the sense of a characteristic.

original: gtan tshigs thogs pa dang bcas pa nyid dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid dang / rgyur byas pa'i gzugs nyid dang / gzugs kyi phung por gtogs pa nyid la sogs pa dag gi phyir ro zhes kyang phyogs gnyi ga la rjes su dpag pa dag brjod par bya'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs thogs pa dang bcas pa nyid dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa nyid dang / rgyur byas pa'i gzugs nyid dang / gzugs kyi phung por gtogs pa nyid la sogs pa dag gi phyir ro zhes kyang phyogs gnyi ga la rjes su dpag pa dag brjod par bya'o //
translated: The two parties can also state inferences, such as: Because it is resistant, because it is derived from the elements, because it is derivative form, because it is included in the form aggregate, and so on.

original: 'dir kha cig na re /
analyzed: 'dir kha cig na re /
translated: Here, some say:

original: mig rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa ni bstan du med pa yin pa'i phyir rung mod kyi /
analyzed: mig rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa ni bstan du med pa yin pa'i phyir rung mod kyi /
translated: It is reasonable that the eye does not see itself because it is not visible.

original: gzugs ni bstan du yod pa yin pas de'i phyir de la lta bar byed do zhes zer ro //
analyzed: gzugs ni bstan du yod pa yin pas de'i phyir de la lta bar byed do zhes zer ro //
translated: But since form is visible, it is seen by that.

original: de la rgyu gzhan des kho bo cag gis smras pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe bsgrub pa'i phyir gnod pa med do //
analyzed: de la rgyu gzhan des kho bo cag gis smras pa'i gtan tshigs dang dpe bsgrub pa'i phyir gnod pa med do //
translated: In that case, the other reason we stated is not invalidated because it proves the example.

original: chos mngon pa pa dag na re /
analyzed: chos mngon pa pa dag na re /
translated: Abhidharmikas say:

original: gal te khyad par med pa'i mig gzugs la lta bar mi byed pa nyid ces zer na /
analyzed: gal te khyad par med pa'i mig gzugs la lta bar mi byed pa nyid ces zer na /
translated: If you say the eye does not see form without a difference,

original: de ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: de ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin te /
translated: that is proving what is already established.

original: phyogs ni de dang mtshungs pa'i mig lta bar mi byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: phyogs ni de dang mtshungs pa'i mig lta bar mi byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because the eye does not see form in that way.

original: 'on te mig gzugs rnams la lta bar mi byed pa bstan pa mtshungs pa la bya'o zhes zer na ni de lta na khas blangs pa la gnod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: 'on te mig gzugs rnams la lta bar mi byed pa bstan pa mtshungs pa la bya'o zhes zer na ni de lta na khas blangs pa la gnod par 'gyur te /
translated: If you say that the eye does not see form is similar to the teaching, then you contradict your own belief.

original: chos mngon pa las /
analyzed: chos mngon pa las /
translated: Because the Abhidharma states:

original: rten mtshungs mig ni gzugs rnams lta //
analyzed: rten mtshungs mig ni gzugs rnams lta //
translated: The eye sees forms with similar support,

original: der rten rnam par shes pa min //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
analyzed: der rten rnam par shes pa min // zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro //
translated: but consciousness supported there does not.

original: de la 'dir brten pa mtshungs pa'i mig nyid phyogs su byas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de la 'dir brten pa mtshungs pa'i mig nyid phyogs su byas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Here, the eye itself with similar support is the subject.

original: grub pa la sgrub pa yang ma yin la /
analyzed: grub pa la sgrub pa yang ma yin la /
translated: It is not a proof of what is already established,

original: khas blangs pa la gnod par yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: khas blangs pa la gnod par yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: and it does not contradict your own belief.

original: mig ni gzugs la mi lta zhing //
analyzed: mig ni gzugs la mi lta zhing //
translated: The eye does not see form,

original: yid ni chos rnams mi shes te //
analyzed: yid ni chos rnams mi shes te //
translated: and the mental faculty does not cognize phenomena.

original: gang la 'jig rten mi 'jug pa //
analyzed: gang la 'jig rten mi 'jug pa //
translated: That which the world does not engage

original: de ni dam pa'i bden pa'o //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de ni dam pa'i bden pa'o //üîΩzhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: is the ultimate truth.

original: don dam par mig gzugs la lta bar byed par khas ma blangs pa'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag pa rgyas pa ji skad bstan pa'i phyir de grub pas don dam par brten pa mtshungs pa'i mig ni gzugs la lta bar mi byed de /üîΩmig @77a * //
analyzed: don dam par mig gzugs la lta bar byed par khas ma blangs pa'i phyir dang / rjes su dpag pa rgyas pa ji skad bstan pa'i phyir de grub pas don dam par brten pa mtshungs pa'i mig ni gzugs la lta bar mi byed de / mig @77a * //
translated: Because it is not accepted that ultimately the eye sees forms, and because the extensive inference has been taught, that is established. Therefore, ultimately the eye that is similar to a support does not see forms.

original: gi dbang po yin pa'i phyir dper na de dang mtshungs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: gi dbang po yin pa'i phyir dper na de dang mtshungs pa bzhin no //
translated: Because it is the eye sense faculty, like that which is similar to it.

original: yang na dbang po gzugs can yin pa'i phyir rna ba bzhin no zhes bkag pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yang na dbang po gzugs can yin pa'i phyir rna ba bzhin no zhes bkag pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Or, because it is a physical sense faculty, like the ear.

original: grags pa'i gnod par yang mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: grags pa'i gnod par yang mi 'gyur te /
translated: Nor is there the fault of contradicting what is commonly acknowledged,

original: dam bcas pa khyad par can nye bar bzung ba nyid kyis de ma spangs pa'i phyir dang ; lan btab zin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dam bcas pa khyad par can nye bar bzung ba nyid kyis de ma spangs pa'i phyir dang ; lan btab zin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because that is not refuted by the specific thesis itself and because it has already been responded to.

original: kha che ba dag na re /üîΩmig ni lta bar byed pa nyid de /
analyzed: kha che ba dag na re / mig ni lta bar byed pa nyid de /
translated: The Kasmiri Vaibhasikas say:

original: lta ba'i byed pa po yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
analyzed: lta ba'i byed pa po yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
translated: The eye is seeing because it is the agent of seeing.

original: kha cig na re /
analyzed: kha cig na re /
translated: Some say:

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: That is illogical.

original: dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir dang / rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir dang / dgag pa smras zin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
analyzed: dam bcas pa'i don gyi phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir dang / rjes su 'gro ba med pa'i phyir dang / dgag pa smras zin pa'i phyir ro zhe na /
translated: because it is only a part of the meaning of the thesis, because it does not follow, and because the negation has already been stated.

original: gzhan dag na re kha che ba dag gis smras pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan dag na re kha che ba dag gis smras pa ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: Others say that the VaibhƒÅ·π£ika position is illogical.

original: skad cig mar smra ba rnams la ni skad cig yin pas bya ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: skad cig mar smra ba rnams la ni skad cig yin pas bya ba mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: For those who advocate momentariness, action is untenable because it is momentary.

original: skad cig ma ma yin par smra ba rnams la yang de nyid de las gzhan pa nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
analyzed: skad cig ma ma yin par smra ba rnams la yang de nyid de las gzhan pa nyid du mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
translated: For those who advocate nonmomentariness, action is untenable because it is not different from that.

original: mdo sde pa dag na re /
analyzed: mdo sde pa dag na re /
translated: SautrƒÅntikas say:

original: 'du byed rnams la bya ba med pa'i phyir mig kyang lta bar mi byed la /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams la bya ba med pa'i phyir mig kyang lta bar mi byed la /
translated: Because formations have no action, the eye does not see,

original: gzhan yang ma yin te /
analyzed: gzhan yang ma yin te /
translated: nor does anything else.

original: 'o na ci zhe na /
analyzed: 'o na ci zhe na /
translated: What then?

original: mdo sde las mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o zhes gsungs pas khyed mig lta bar mi byed do zhes zer ba ni grub pa kho na la sgrub pa yin no zhe'o //
analyzed: mdo sde las mig dang gzugs rnams la brten nas mig gi rnam par shes pa skye'o zhes gsungs pas khyed mig lta bar mi byed do zhes zer ba ni grub pa kho na la sgrub pa yin no zhe'o //
translated: Since the sutra says, ‚ÄúThe eye consciousness arises in dependence on the eye and forms,‚Äù it is established that you do not see.

original: skye ba bkag pa kho nas mig gi rnam par shes pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin no /
analyzed: skye ba bkag pa kho nas mig gi rnam par shes pa mi 'thad pa'i phyir grub pa la sgrub pa ma yin no /
translated: Since the mere refutation of arising is not tenable as the eye consciousness, it is not established.

original: khas blangs pa la gnod par mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: khas blangs pa la gnod par mi 'gyur te /
translated: It does not undermine what we accept.

original: tha snyad kyi bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i mdo sde'i don khas blangs pa'i phyir dang / don dam par mdo sde'i don la rigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: tha snyad kyi bden pa dang rjes su mthun pa'i mdo sde'i don khas blangs pa'i phyir dang / don dam par mdo sde'i don la rigs pa med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because we accept the meaning of the sutras in accordance with conventional truth and because reasoning does not apply to the meaning of the sutras in the ultimate truth.

original: mig dang gzugs kyi skye mched kyi skye ba bkag pa'i phyir dang ; mig dang gzugs dag gi lta ba po dang / lta ba nyid bkag pa'i phyir de'i khyad par mi srid pas chog mod kyi /
analyzed: mig dang gzugs kyi skye mched kyi skye ba bkag pa'i phyir dang ; mig dang gzugs dag gi lta ba po dang / lta ba nyid bkag pa'i phyir de'i khyad par mi srid pas chog mod kyi /
translated: Since the arising of the eye and form sources is refuted, and since the seer and seeing of the eye and form are refuted, it is sufficient that their characteristics are impossible.

original: 'on kyang nyan pa'i skye bo'i blo gros dbye bar 'dod pas phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o //üîΩlta ba rang gi bdag nyid na //
analyzed: 'on kyang nyan pa'i skye bo'i blo gros dbye bar 'dod pas phyogs tsam zhig bshad par bya'o // lta ba rang gi bdag nyid na //
translated: Nevertheless, I will explain a little, wishing to distinguish the intelligence of those who listen.üîΩThe view that it does not see itself

original: de ni de la mi lta nyid //
analyzed: de ni de la mi lta nyid //
translated: is not seeing itself.

original: ces bya bas snga ma bzhin du rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa nyid phyogs kyi chos su bstan nas /
analyzed: ces bya bas snga ma bzhin du rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa nyid phyogs kyi chos su bstan nas /
translated: As before, the property of the position is stated: it does not see itself.

original: gang tshe bdag la mi lta ba //
analyzed: gang tshe bdag la mi lta ba //
translated: When it does not see itself,

original: de gzhan dag la ji ltar lta //
analyzed: de gzhan dag la ji ltar lta //
translated: how will it see others?

original: zhes bya ba 'dis bsgrub par bya ba chos nye bar gzhag pa'i phyir gzhan gyis yongs su brtag pa'i rnam par rtog pa gzhan bsal bar 'dod pas sbyor ba'i tshig dag bya'o //
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'dis bsgrub par bya ba chos nye bar gzhag pa'i phyir gzhan gyis yongs su brtag pa'i rnam par rtog pa gzhan bsal bar 'dod pas sbyor ba'i tshig dag bya'o //
translated: In order to posit the predicate of the proposition, he states the syllogism, wishing to eliminate other conceptions imagined by others.

original: de la gang dag mig ni ma phrad @77b pa 'dzin pa'o zhes zer ba de dag gi phyir lta bar byed pa ni shes pa'i don yin pa'i phyir dper na rgyal po dag gis rtog chen dag las shes pa bzhin te /
analyzed: de la gang dag mig ni ma phrad @77b pa 'dzin pa'o zhes zer ba de dag gi phyir lta bar byed pa ni shes pa'i don yin pa'i phyir dper na rgyal po dag gis rtog chen dag las shes pa bzhin te /
translated: In this regard, those who say the eye apprehends without contact are refuted by the statement, ‚ÄúBecause seeing is the meaning of knowing,‚Äù as in the case of the king‚Äôs spies.

original: rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because it does not see itself.

original: gtan tshigs kyi don ni rang gi bdag nyid mi shes pa yin no //
analyzed: gtan tshigs kyi don ni rang gi bdag nyid mi shes pa yin no //
translated: The meaning of the reason is that it does not know itself.

original: don dam par mig ni yul ma phrad pa 'dzin pa ma yin te /
analyzed: don dam par mig ni yul ma phrad pa 'dzin pa ma yin te /
translated: Ultimately, the eye does not apprehend an object that is not in contact with it,

original: rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa'i phyir dper na sna la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa'i phyir dper na sna la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: because it does not see itself, like the nose and so on.

original: de bzhin du don dam par gzugs ni mig gi dbang po yul ma phrad par 'dzin pa'i gzung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du don dam par gzugs ni mig gi dbang po yul ma phrad par 'dzin pa'i gzung ba ma yin te /
translated: Similarly, ultimately form is not apprehended by the eye faculty as an object that is not in contact with it,

original: 'byung ba las gyur pa yin pa'i phyir dper na dri la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'byung ba las gyur pa yin pa'i phyir dper na dri la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: because it is derived from the elements, like smell and so on.

original: rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa ni mtshan nyid kyi sgra'i tshul nye bar bzung ba'i phyir te /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa dang / 'byung ba las gyur pa ni mtshan nyid kyi sgra'i tshul nye bar bzung ba'i phyir te /
translated: Because it does not see itself and because it is derived from the elements, the meaning of the reason is stated by the method of definition.

original: gtan tshigs thogs pa dang bcas pa nyid la sogs pa dag gi phyir ro zhes kyang phyogs gnyi ga la rjes su dpag pa dag brjod par bya zhing sbyor ba'i tshig ci rigs pa rgyas par bya'o //
analyzed: gtan tshigs thogs pa dang bcas pa nyid la sogs pa dag gi phyir ro zhes kyang phyogs gnyi ga la rjes su dpag pa dag brjod par bya zhing sbyor ba'i tshig ci rigs pa rgyas par bya'o //
translated: But in both cases, one should state the inferences and elaborate the statements of the syllogisms as much as is appropriate.

original: yang na don dam par mig ni yul ma phrad pa 'dzin pa yin par mi 'dod de /
analyzed: yang na don dam par mig ni yul ma phrad pa 'dzin pa yin par mi 'dod de /
translated: Or, one could say, ultimately, the eye is not asserted to apprehend an object without contact,

original: da ltar gyi yul mngon sum pa yin pa'i phyir dper na sna tshogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: da ltar gyi yul mngon sum pa yin pa'i phyir dper na sna tshogs pa bzhin no //
translated: because it is a present, directly perceptible object, as is the case, for example, with a multicolored object.

original: ci ste mig ni yul ma phrad pa 'dzin pa yin te /
analyzed: ci ste mig ni yul ma phrad pa 'dzin pa yin te /
translated: But if the eye apprehends an object without contact,

original: gzugs bar du chod pa 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / rtsol pa tha dad pa med pa dang / dus tha dad pa med par 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / rang las lhag pa'i yul 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / dper na yid bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: gzugs bar du chod pa 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / rtsol pa tha dad pa med pa dang / dus tha dad pa med par 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / rang las lhag pa'i yul 'dzin pa'i phyir dang / dper na yid bzhin no zhe na /
translated: because it apprehends form that is obstructed, because it apprehends without a separate exertion, because it apprehends without a separate time, and because it apprehends an object that is superior to itself, like the mind.

original: de yang bzang po ma yin te /
analyzed: de yang bzang po ma yin te /
translated: That is not good.

original: 'di la ma phrad pa 'dzin pa ni gzugs bar du chod pa 'dzin pa'i don yin la /
analyzed: 'di la ma phrad pa 'dzin pa ni gzugs bar du chod pa 'dzin pa'i don yin la /
translated: Here, apprehending without contact means apprehending form that is obstructed.

original: gzugs bar du chod pa 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don kyang de nyid yin pas dam bcas pa'i phyir don gyi phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir dang / rtsol ba tha dad pa med pa dang / dus tha dad pa med par 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba yang ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs bar du chod pa 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba'i don kyang de nyid yin pas dam bcas pa'i phyir don gyi phyogs gcig yin pa'i phyir dang / rtsol ba tha dad pa med pa dang / dus tha dad pa med par 'dzin pa'i phyir zhes bya ba yang ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: And because it is not established that ‚Äúit apprehends without a difference in exertion‚Äù and ‚Äúit apprehends without a difference in time.‚Äù

original: gtan tshigs grub tu zin na yang rjes su 'gro ba mi 'grub ste /
analyzed: gtan tshigs grub tu zin na yang rjes su 'gro ba mi 'grub ste /
translated: Even if the reason were established, the pervasion would not be established,

original: don dam par yid kyang ma phrad pa 'dzin pa nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: don dam par yid kyang ma phrad pa 'dzin pa nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is not established that the mind ultimately apprehends without contact.

original: yang na don 'gal ba nyid kyang yin no //
analyzed: yang na don 'gal ba nyid kyang yin no //
translated: Or, it is contradictory to the object.

original: grangs can dag mig ni yul dang ma phrad pa 'dzin pa ma yin te zhes bya ba de ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no zhes zer na /
analyzed: grangs can dag mig ni yul dang ma phrad pa 'dzin pa ma yin te zhes bya ba de ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin no zhes zer na /
translated: The SƒÅ·πÉkhyas say, ‚ÄúThe statement ‚ÄòThe eye does not apprehend without contacting the object‚Äô is an affirmation of what is already established.‚Äù

original: mig yul ma phrad pa 'dzin pa nyid kyi chos stong pa nyid du bstan pas yul phrad pa 'dzin pa yin no zhes bsgrub pa'i tshul gyis ma bstan pa'i phyir gnas ma yin pa la dbugs 'byin to zhes brjod par @78a * //
analyzed: mig yul ma phrad pa 'dzin pa nyid kyi chos stong pa nyid du bstan pas yul phrad pa 'dzin pa yin no zhes bsgrub pa'i tshul gyis ma bstan pa'i phyir gnas ma yin pa la dbugs 'byin to zhes brjod par @78a * //
translated: Therefore it is said that it is not a suitable example.

original: bya'o // gzhan yang mig ni yul phrad pa 'dzin pa yin par mi 'dod de /
analyzed: bya'o // gzhan yang mig ni yul phrad pa 'dzin pa yin par mi 'dod de /
translated: Moreover, the eye sense faculty is not asserted to apprehend its object through contact,

original: dbang po yin pa'i phyir dper na yid bzhin no //
analyzed: dbang po yin pa'i phyir dper na yid bzhin no //
translated: because it is a sense faculty, like the mental faculty.

original: sna la sogs pa dag gis ma nges pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
analyzed: sna la sogs pa dag gis ma nges pa nyid kyang ma yin te /
translated: It is not the case that the nose sense faculty and so on are indeterminate.

original: de dag kyang 'og nas de dang 'dra ba kho nar ston pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: de dag kyang 'og nas de dang 'dra ba kho nar ston pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because they are taught to be the same below.

original: phrad pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i don kyang gang yin /
analyzed: phrad pa 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i don kyang gang yin /
translated: What is the meaning of apprehending through contact?

original: gal te gnas nas yul gyi phyogs su song ste 'dzin par byed pa'o zhe na /
analyzed: gal te gnas nas yul gyi phyogs su song ste 'dzin par byed pa'o zhe na /
translated: If it is said that it apprehends by going to the place of the object from its location,

original: don dam par mig gi 'jug pa ni /
analyzed: don dam par mig gi 'jug pa ni /
translated: then ultimately the engagement of the eye sense faculty

original: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam grangs kyi gnas nas phyi rol du mi 'gro ste /
analyzed: mig gi rnam par shes pa'i rnam grangs kyi gnas nas phyi rol du mi 'gro ste /
translated: does not go outside from the location that is a synonym of eye consciousness.

original: 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir dper na sna la sogs pa'i dbang po'i 'jug pa bzhin no //
analyzed: 'jug pa yin pa'i phyir dper na sna la sogs pa'i dbang po'i 'jug pa bzhin no //
translated: because it is the operation of the eye, as in the case of the operation of the sense faculties such as the nose, etc.

original: de bzhin du don dam par gzugs ni mig gi dbang po yul phrad pa 'dzin pa'i gzung ba ma yin te /
analyzed: de bzhin du don dam par gzugs ni mig gi dbang po yul phrad pa 'dzin pa'i gzung ba ma yin te /
translated: Similarly, ultimately, form is not the object apprehended by the eye faculty that encounters its object,

original: rgyu can yin pa'i phyir dper na sgra la sogs pa bzhin no //
analyzed: rgyu can yin pa'i phyir dper na sgra la sogs pa bzhin no //
translated: because it has a cause, as in the case of sound, etc.

original: ji ste phyogs gnyi gar bstan pa'i rjes su dpag pa rgyas pa dag gi phyogs gcig gi gcig brtsal ba'i phyir gang yang rung ba la ma grub pa yin no zhe na /
analyzed: ji ste phyogs gnyi gar bstan pa'i rjes su dpag pa rgyas pa dag gi phyogs gcig gi gcig brtsal ba'i phyir gang yang rung ba la ma grub pa yin no zhe na /
translated: If you say that the inference is inconclusive because it is stated in both ways, then it is not established for either party.

original: gnyi ga med pa'i phyir mi sgrub par 'dod pa grub bo //üîΩgang dag la mig gi 'od zer yul gyi phyogs su song ste /
analyzed: gnyi ga med pa'i phyir mi sgrub par 'dod pa grub bo // gang dag la mig gi 'od zer yul gyi phyogs su song ste /
translated: We maintain that it is not established because of the absence of both.

original: yul 'dzin par byed do snyam pa'i blo gros yod pa de dag la yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
analyzed: yul 'dzin par byed do snyam pa'i blo gros yod pa de dag la yang 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste /
translated: For those who think that the light rays of the eye go out to the object and apprehend the object, it should be said:

original: tha snyad du yang mig gi dbang po ni 'od zer dang bcas pa ma yin par shes par bya ste /
analyzed: tha snyad du yang mig gi dbang po ni 'od zer dang bcas pa ma yin par shes par bya ste /
translated: Even conventionally, the eye faculty is not held to be endowed with light rays,üîΩbecause it is the eye faculty,

original: gzugs dmigs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dper na gzugs bzhin no //
analyzed: gzugs dmigs pa'i rgyu yin pa'i phyir dper na gzugs bzhin no //
translated: because it is the cause of the perception of form, like form.

original: gal te mig gi dbang po ni 'od zer dang bcas pa kho na yin te /üîΩmig gi dbang po yin pa'i phyir dper na /
analyzed: gal te mig gi dbang po ni 'od zer dang bcas pa kho na yin te / mig gi dbang po yin pa'i phyir dper na /
translated: If you say that the eye sense faculty is only accompanied by light rays,üîΩbecause it is the eye sense faculty, like the eye sense faculty of a mouse,

original: byi ba la sogs pa mtshan mo rgyu ba'i mig bzhin no zhe na /
analyzed: byi ba la sogs pa mtshan mo rgyu ba'i mig bzhin no zhe na /
translated: which is active at night,

original: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
analyzed: de ni rigs pa ma yin te /
translated: that is not logical,

original: mig gi dbang po ni bstan du med pa'i phyir dang / de'i gnas 'od zer dang bcas pa nyid yin du zin na yang dpe ma grub pa'i phyir dang / 'gal ba 'khrul pa med pa'i gnod pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: mig gi dbang po ni bstan du med pa'i phyir dang / de'i gnas 'od zer dang bcas pa nyid yin du zin na yang dpe ma grub pa'i phyir dang / 'gal ba 'khrul pa med pa'i gnod pa yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the eye sense faculty is not demonstrable, because even if its location were accompanied by light rays, the example would not be established, and because there is the fault of the contradiction of nonerroneous perception.

original: dpyad pa rnam par 'phros pas chog gi skabs nyid kyi dbang du bya'o //üîΩlta ba rang gi bdag nyid na //üîΩde ni de la mi lta nyid //
analyzed: dpyad pa rnam par 'phros pas chog gi skabs nyid kyi dbang du bya'o // lta ba rang gi bdag nyid na // de ni de la mi lta nyid //
translated: Enough of this extensive analysis.üîΩThe view itself does not see itself.

original: gang tshe bdag la mi lta ba //
analyzed: gang tshe bdag la mi lta ba //
translated: When it does not see itself,

original: de gzhan bdag la ji ltar lta //
analyzed: de gzhan bdag la ji ltar lta //
translated: how will it see others?

original: zhes bya ba 'di la kha cig na re /
analyzed: zhes bya ba 'di la kha cig na re /
translated: With regard to this, someone might say,

original: 'di la dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni rang gi bdag nyid la mthong na /
analyzed: 'di la dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo nyid ni rang gi bdag nyid la mthong na /
translated: If the essence of things were seen in their own nature,

original: de dang ldan pas gzhan gyi bdag nyid la yang dmigs par 'gyur te /üîΩdper na chu la rlan mthong na de dang ldan pas sa la yang dmigs pa dang / me la tsha ba mthong na de dang ldan @78b pas chu la yang dmigs pa dang / sna ma'i me tog la dri zhim pa nyid mthong na de dang ldan pas /
analyzed: de dang ldan pas gzhan gyi bdag nyid la yang dmigs par 'gyur te / dper na chu la rlan mthong na de dang ldan pas sa la yang dmigs pa dang / me la tsha ba mthong na de dang ldan @78b pas chu la yang dmigs pa dang / sna ma'i me tog la dri zhim pa nyid mthong na de dang ldan pas /
translated: then because they possess that essence, they would also be observed in the nature of others.

original: gos la yang dmigs pa lta bu yin na /
analyzed: gos la yang dmigs pa lta bu yin na /
translated: For example, if one sees water as wet, then because it possesses that quality, one observes that earth is also wet. If one sees fire as hot, then because it possesses that quality, one observes that water is also hot. If one sees a jasmine flower as fragrant, then because it possesses that quality, one observes that cloth is also fragrant.

original: dngos po gang rang gi bdag nyid la mi snang ba de gzhan gyi bdag nyid la ji ltar dmigs par 'gyur te /
analyzed: dngos po gang rang gi bdag nyid la mi snang ba de gzhan gyi bdag nyid la ji ltar dmigs par 'gyur te /
translated: But if a thing is not seen in its own nature, how could it be observed in the nature of others?

original: 'di ltar sna ma'i me tog la dri nga ba nyid ma mthong na gos la yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
analyzed: 'di ltar sna ma'i me tog la dri nga ba nyid ma mthong na gos la yang dmigs par mi 'gyur ba lta bu'o //
translated: For example, if one does not see a jasmine flower as foul smelling, one will not observe that cloth is also foul smelling.

original: de'i phyir gal te lta ba rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar byed na ni /
analyzed: de'i phyir gal te lta ba rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar byed na ni /
translated: Therefore, if seeing sees its own nature, then it would also see the nature of others.

original: des na gzugs la lta bar byed pas lta ba'o zhes bya ba de 'thad par 'gyur ba zhig na /
analyzed: des na gzugs la lta bar byed pas lta ba'o zhes bya ba de 'thad par 'gyur ba zhig na /
translated: Therefore, it is tenable to say that since it sees form, it is seeing.

original: lta ba na rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed do //
analyzed: lta ba na rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed do //
translated: But when seeing, it does not see itself.

original: gang rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa de gzhan dag la ji ltar lta bar byed de /
analyzed: gang rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar mi byed pa de gzhan dag la ji ltar lta bar byed de /
translated: How can that which does not see itself see other things?

original: de bas na gzugs la lta bar byed pas lta ba'o zhes bya ba de mi 'thad do //
analyzed: de bas na gzugs la lta bar byed pas lta ba'o zhes bya ba de mi 'thad do //
translated: Therefore, it is not tenable to say that since it sees form, it is seeing.

original: slob dpon 'phags pa lhas kyang /
analyzed: slob dpon 'phags pa lhas kyang /
translated: ƒÄryadeva also says:

original: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni //
analyzed: dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni //
translated: The nature of all things

original: thog mar bdag la snang gyur na //üîΩmig nyid la yang mig gis ni //
analyzed: thog mar bdag la snang gyur na // mig nyid la yang mig gis ni //
translated: First appears in itself.üîΩWhy doesn‚Äôt the eye

original: ci yi phyir na 'dzin mi 'gyur //üîΩzhes gsungs so zhes zer ro //
analyzed: ci yi phyir na 'dzin mi 'gyur // zhes gsungs so zhes zer ro //
translated: Grasp itself, as it does other things?

original: de la 'dir rang gi sde pa dag na re /
analyzed: de la 'dir rang gi sde pa dag na re /
translated: Here, our schools say:

original: lta ba gzugs dmigs pa de gal te ji ltar mig la med pa de bzhin du gzugs la yang med do zhe na ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin te /
analyzed: lta ba gzugs dmigs pa de gal te ji ltar mig la med pa de bzhin du gzugs la yang med do zhe na ni grub pa la sgrub pa yin te /
translated: If you say that the seeing that observes form does not exist in the eye just as it does not exist in form, then you are proving what is already established.

original: de ltar yang /
analyzed: de ltar yang /
translated: As it is said:

original: de ni mig dang gzugs la med //
analyzed: de ni mig dang gzugs la med //
translated: It does not exist in the eye or in form.

original: de gnyis byar na'ang yod ma yin //üîΩgang du de ni gnas 'gyur ba //üîΩde yod ma yin de med min //
analyzed: de gnyis byar na'ang yod ma yin // gang du de ni gnas 'gyur ba // de yod ma yin de med min //
translated: If they both exist and do not exist, then they are not seen.

original: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
analyzed: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro zhe'o //
translated: If they neither exist nor do not exist, then they are not seen.

original: kha cig na re /
analyzed: kha cig na re /
translated: Some say:

original: ji ste rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar byed pa'i nus pa med do zhe na ni /
analyzed: ji ste rang gi bdag nyid la lta bar byed pa'i nus pa med do zhe na ni /
translated: If it is said that the eye does not have the power to see itself,

original: sna ma'i me tog dag de'i dper mi rung ste /
analyzed: sna ma'i me tog dag de'i dper mi rung ste /
translated: then the example of the jasmine flower is not suitable,

original: sna ma'i me tog dag la chogs pa'i dbang gis dri zhim pa nyid dag 'byung ba'i phyir me tog dang phrad pas 'bru mar dri zhim pa nyid du 'gyur ba bzhin no //
analyzed: sna ma'i me tog dag la chogs pa'i dbang gis dri zhim pa nyid dag 'byung ba'i phyir me tog dang phrad pas 'bru mar dri zhim pa nyid du 'gyur ba bzhin no //
translated: because the jasmine flower has the power to produce a sweet smell.

original: gzugs la lta bar byed pa'i bya ba yang sus kyang khas ma blangs pas de 'gog pa yang mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzugs la lta bar byed pa'i bya ba yang sus kyang khas ma blangs pas de 'gog pa yang mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Also, no one accepts that the eye has the activity of seeing form, so it is not tenable to refute that.

original: ci ste bdag nyid la 'dzin par mi byed pa bzhin du gzhan dag la yang 'dzin par mi byed par sgrub na ni de lta na yang dpes mi nus te //
analyzed: ci ste bdag nyid la 'dzin par mi byed pa bzhin du gzhan dag la yang 'dzin par mi byed par sgrub na ni de lta na yang dpes mi nus te //
translated: If you prove that just as it does not grasp itself, it also does not grasp others, then the example is not suitable.

original: me dang sna ma'i me tog dag rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid la 'dzin par mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me dang sna ma'i me tog dag rang dang gzhan gyi bdag nyid la 'dzin par mi byed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because fire and jasmine flowers do not apprehend themselves and others.

original: de lta bas na de ni rigs pa min no zhe'o //
analyzed: de lta bas na de ni rigs pa min no zhe'o //
translated: Therefore, that is illogical.

original: de'i phyir de ltar mig lta bar ma grub pas skye ba yang ma grub /
analyzed: de'i phyir de ltar mig lta bar ma grub pas skye ba yang ma grub /
translated: Thus, since seeing is not established for the eye, arising is not established.

original: 'gro ba yang ma grub ste /
analyzed: 'gro ba yang ma grub ste /
translated: Going is also not established,

original: dpe med pa'i phyir ro //üîΩyang na gtan tshigs 'gal ba @79a * //
analyzed: dpe med pa'i phyir ro // yang na gtan tshigs 'gal ba @79a * //
translated: because there is no example.

original: nyid kyang yin no //
analyzed: nyid kyang yin no //
translated: Moreover, the reason is contradictory.

original: 'dir smras pa /üîΩkhyod bsgrub pa'i don sgro btags nas mig gzugs la lta bar mi byed de /
analyzed: 'dir smras pa / khyod bsgrub pa'i don sgro btags nas mig gzugs la lta bar mi byed de /
translated: Here, someone might say,

original: rang gi bdag nyid lta bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni 'di skad ces gal te de la rang gi bdag nyid la nus pa med na /
analyzed: rang gi bdag nyid lta bar mi byed pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni 'di skad ces gal te de la rang gi bdag nyid la nus pa med na /
translated: ‚ÄúYou superimpose the object of affirmation and say, ‚ÄòThe eye does not see forms because it does not see itself.‚Äô

original: de la gzhan gyi bdag nyid la yang de med par bstan pa yin no //
analyzed: de la gzhan gyi bdag nyid la yang de med par bstan pa yin no //
translated: If it has no power over itself, it is taught that it also has no power over others.

original: de lta na yang ma nges pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de lta na yang ma nges pa nyid yin te /
translated: Even so, it is still uncertain.

original: me la rang gi bdag nyid la sreg par byed pa'i nus pa nyid med du zin kyang gzhan gyi bdag nyid la sreg par byed nus pa nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: me la rang gi bdag nyid la sreg par byed pa'i nus pa nyid med du zin kyang gzhan gyi bdag nyid la sreg par byed nus pa nyid yod pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Although fire does not have the power to burn itself, it does have the power to burn another.

original: 'dir bshad pa /
analyzed: 'dir bshad pa /
translated: Here we say:

original: lta ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: lta ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of establishing seeing,

original: me yi dpes ni nus ma yin //
analyzed: me yi dpes ni nus ma yin //
translated: The example of fire is not suitable.

original: mig ni lta ba'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don de rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid kyi skyon brjod pa ste /
analyzed: mig ni lta ba'i ngo bo nyid yin no zhes bya ba'i don de rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir gtan tshigs ma nges pa nyid kyi skyon brjod pa ste /
translated: The error of the reason being inconclusive is stated in order to establish the meaning ‚Äúthe eye has the nature of seeing.‚Äù

original: don dam par me ni sreg par byed pa nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir dang / tha snyad du yang lta ba'i ngo bo nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
analyzed: don dam par me ni sreg par byed pa nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir dang / tha snyad du yang lta ba'i ngo bo nyid du ma grub pa'i phyir ro zhes bya bar dgongs so //
translated: The meaning is that ultimately fire is not established as having the nature of burning, and conventionally it is not established as having the nature of seeing.üîΩOr,

original: yang na / lta ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
analyzed: yang na / lta ba rab tu bsgrub pa'i phyir //
translated: For the sake of establishing seeing,

original: me yi dpes ni nus ma yin //
analyzed: me yi dpes ni nus ma yin //
translated: The example of fire is not suitable.
